lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors play Dungeons & Dragons and point to Liam O'Brien for the evening, you motherfucker.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's the winner! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So for those of you who are tuning in for the first time, welcome to the chaos. We have a fun continuation of a very fun story line, but before we get to that, let's go ahead and get through our announcements for the evening. First and foremost, once again, we thank last week's sponsor Backblaze but today brings back Loot Crate once again!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Loot Crate! (cheering) (air horns)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam, why don't you tell us all about it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Loot Crate, guys. (clears throat) Okay, so here's the thing--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No notes! Flying without a net!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just a box of screws and nails. You got your wood screws, you got your metal screws, your two-inchers, your one-inchers. Pretty cheap to produce.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thoughtful!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Storks! In theaters now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that actually a real movie?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it is out now. Storks, animated film.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I still think Stork Patrol's the best Andy Samberg-related stork thing that's ever happened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those are my ideas for what could be announced on Monday, and whatever it is, when it is announced, go online, subscribe, use the code "CRITICALROLE" to get three dollars off your subscription. Loot Crate, we love them, no matter what the theme is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Holy shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I feel like we should put a Twitter poll up at some point about which of those three we all believe it might be.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's make a poll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to do that right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. (laughs) Next announcement--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's going to be the next show I produce. "Let's Make a Poll" with Sam Riegel. Keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha, you want to talk about the new host--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's up! Look at that segue.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was slightly less awkward than a real Segway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It feels like it went away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It feels like it went away. It did not! You just forgot about it, it's back with Damion Poitier. He's awesome. He was Thanos, the first Thanos before he got replaced because celebrities are dicks. And--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Except for the ones who come on our show.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, he was also Chains in Payday, which is what everyone has been now shouting at us through Twitter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He was in Civil War as the guy that gets killed by a cop.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was. He gets killed in Civil War-- Technically tranquilized. Apparently, is what he clarified. Anyway--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tranquilized, in a Spielberg ET walkie-talkie gun replacement world, he was "tranquilized."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Other than being Chains being on social media, people have also shouted he's very attractive and sexy, so maybe that's a selling point for you. So you should go watch it. It's out right now, his second episode is out this past Tuesday. Go watch him! He's funny, he's very charming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He has great shirts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura, did you have an update in regards to the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Merchandise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sings) Merchandise!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've been organizing my dice while you guys were talking and so now I'm set. In the store, we have things available for you to buy. And--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are they?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not as good at this as Sam is. Okay, so the rings: there's two sizes left. There's six and seven. So if you have little itty-bitty fingers, you can still get one. The patches are out of stock, sorry people, but I'm proud of everybody that got one. The nail wraps are still there, the mugs are still there and the pins and the wristbands that Travis is wearing right now--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I sleep in this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those are available for pre-order for one more day as of 5:00pm, I think our time? California time? They're going to be out of the store.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And it's legit. Mine smells like a cast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's been wearing it every day. It does not-- It doesn't smell that bad!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Casts just smell like you after a while.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The nail wraps are limited too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah I know! The nail wraps-- only some, a few left in stock.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go get 'em. You got to go get 'em.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The guys like to get 'em and put them on their middle fingers, so that you can flick off--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got mine for a Disney trip later this week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, nice, the patchwork ones? Those are good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's real close.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Through a couple of Scry attempts, you managed to see that she, with her own band of bodyguards, was currently heading north through the ocean via ship, towards something in the distance which you found to be an island made, or is now currently covered in, shards of broken glass, known as Glintshore, as part of the Hespit Archipelago. You guys manage to, through your influence and discussion, attain a skyship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who knew?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have your wings out still. You guys have flown about and you've seen the remnants of some sort of small campsite, with a faint ember still burning and giving off a hint of smoke, but it's been a while since it's been utilized.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We said like five hours is what I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About five hours. You just got there and checked it right now. We'll get into the more specifics of that here in a moment. So we have currently, if I recall, Grog as an eagle, Scanlan, and who else is in the center of the beach area between the actual shoreline and the jungle?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just showing up on the beach.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was also on the beach.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought we were en route when we ended.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We had just landed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys had just gotten there. Yeah, so we have, in between the shoreline and the tree line, the mostly dead, petrified trees, gray in the distance. We have the two of you and the rest of you currently are now gathering at the beach at the campsite.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pop Trinket out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Trinket (growls) looks around, immediately looks down at a paw with a piece of glass sticking out of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, buddy. You're tough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you see there are two small boats that are currently pulled up onto the shore, just outside, slightly north of this campsite. There is a tousled blanket that is somewhat dirty, with a small pack that was pushed in the side, the leftover campfire and some sort of movement, like something heavy had been pulled from the water into the campsite and somewhere else from within. Do you wish to continue to inspect the campsite?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see any tracks? Are there tracks able to be left on the glass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation-- for this, for you, are you just inspecting for details? Or are you trying to track?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm trying to see where the people went.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a survival check to see if you can follow any tracks. What are other people doing at the campsite?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to check the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: New die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Survival? 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What'd you get?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got an eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. They're boats. They're made of wood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I tousle the blanket aside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. There's two blankets that are folded in there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's in that pack?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What pack?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There was a pack in the bag.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there a pack in the bag?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, your low roll investigation allowed you to completely miss that there was a pack on the side of the blankets. You go to inspect it. You check and see that there are a number of footfalls in this area clustered--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not at my best.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --sporadically, it looks like some of them seem to be with haste, some are dragging, like, heavy-- the heels are pushed in deep. And you see a large, heavy groove that was pulled to the campsite and has pulled further and further inland towards the treeline.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys doing right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to mount Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank god. It's been so long.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And say, Let's go scan around the tree line, friend. Fly! Fly!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then I take off in my bird form, admiring the ar

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You're such a dick.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I head for the treeline.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you have advantage, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're an eagle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do your eagle eyes see, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not shit, apparently.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the possibility that Ripley can make herself invisible?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I legitimately have no idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With my brand-new awesome d20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Little dappled, peppering of green. But the canopy itself is still too thick for you to make out any details from above. That's as much as you can make out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Petri-fried trees or are they scorched?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both. It looks like a lot of it is burnt black, but some of it also looks like the wood itself has been dead for so long that it's become a dull grey, hardened exterior.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It sounded like you said "petri-fried".

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Petri-fried.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Petri-fried. Entire State Building.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Turns into stone, it's deep-battered, covered in cheese.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You didn't see anything, Groggy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (squawks)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guess not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Scanlan, I may borrow you for a second.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm in the air, you can't talk to me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have an earpiece, damn it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm on an [no audio].

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When you get a moment, we could use you for a second down here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When you have a moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I start taking my broom and swinging it around me to see if I hit anything that's invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: By the way, did you see anything when you crashed through? Were there people on the ship?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, there was one that I might have crushed underneath me that went down. There were also others on the ship, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There was another that was crushed beneath your feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So probably dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, there might be a couple, if they're real good swimmers, they might make it? With severe burns. And psychological damage. But-- maybe?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A little creepy, but a very good job.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will turn Grog's head and point him back to the campsite.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you turn my head?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I'll say to you, oi, if you don't see anything, caw once and we'll head back to camp.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (squawks three times)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I forgot you can't count.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He says he sees three things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, we just fly around then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, instead of that, can we go 100 yards past the tree line and into more of the forest, just to see what's there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah. You coast up and begin pushing through and down below, you can see occasional breaks in the treeline here and there where you can-- there's heavy brush underneath and the same horrible texture of broken glass jutting out in haphazard patterns. There are certain areas where the glass is aggressively broken, and some more smooth glass. It looks like it depends on at what point this event happened that turned this entire island and how much has been traversed in the time. But you can't make out much more than that from your height.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have I got about 30 or 40 minutes left for the wings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Approximately.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to fly out over where the ship was and see if anybody is doing the dog paddle out there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You go heading off in that direction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll land us at the treeline.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no particular reason as to why there should be a sudden gust of wind. There is no weather that is indicative of that sort of--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also my Control Weather spell should still be active.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So nature check? Druid check? What the shit is happening check?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nurture check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nurture check? Nature versus nurture check? 14?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you start to get that dark feeling at the back of your head, you start noticing that some of the broken glass that is across the entirety of this beach being picked up by the wind. Swirling and congealing into a small whirlwind of broken glass and dust.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I toss Percy his gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the wind begins to pick up into two other separate, smaller shapes, but that one central funnel continues to grow and grow, like this angry, waving tornado of broken--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to flip one of the boats over as a shield and hide behind it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As a druid, would I recognize if this is an air elemental situation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh, why are they always intelligence--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage because it is possibly elemental-based.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two of the entities that are coming out of this wind from the sides are definitely air elemental by nature. You're very familiar with this form of physicality. You've taken on this form of physicality. However, whatever this large, strange glass-shard-encompassed entity is, it's elemental in nature but you're not sure what it is. You've not encountered something of this form, at least on this plane.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bigger?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bigger.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Badder?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like you to roll initiative.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just the three of them, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does the wind seem strong enough that if I hopped up on my broom that I would get blown away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not at the moment, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I want to try doing that, then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, he's pulling it back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw snap!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at the water!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Boats, there's little boats!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It looks like waves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Hello, my name is Simon.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (singing) And I like to do drawings.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy has taken one of the boats and placed it as a guard. Keyleth stands here. You guys are way off at the treeline.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just pointing and laughing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh god! I killed Percy! There we go. And Vax, you're off that side. What you're seeing is this swirling torrent of broken glass with these two air elementals encroaching on the sides there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, let's go ahead and roll some initiative, folks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I get in the air before initiative, or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say as the wind's picking up, you can begin to get up in the air, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How far are you going up? Whole 30 feet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like 20 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 feet? All righty, let's do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sighs) This isn't great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't quite know what to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't, either. I'm assuming there hasn't been enough time to where we've taken a short rest, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not good, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, we'll say there you are, on your broom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So initiative rolls here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's going to be so useful against a tornado.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, he can bite the wind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Of course, really anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I legitimately have no idea what's about to happen, because--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so 25 to 20?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we all? We're not all rolling, just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone right now? Even though you're not currently in the middle of the fray, this is going to gauge how soon you can get to them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're an eagle!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because I have advantage on initiative rolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. So plus-- what's your dex?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My dex is two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 22.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the same as me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, 20 to 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. You got 19? Scanlan. Vax. 15 to ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten. Yay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five. (clears throat) Five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. You're going to be the most useful one too. It's okay, it's power play right at the end.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It takes both of my beast-shaping forms to go elemental.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: (singing) It takes two, baby!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) It takes two, baby!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow, I did that too, except I went Into the Woods.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Swirling forward, the giant maelstrom, its speed rapid-fast, this torrent of razor-sharp glass bits spirals forward and threatens to engulf both Percy and Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Guess I should have gone higher.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to mock my cover, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it moves around it. Unfortunately, a [no audio] like this can swirl through the small spaces. All right, so we have that. It's going to go ahead and attempt a Whirlwind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I need both Vex and Percy to roll a strength saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, this is not a ranged attack on any level, I can't counter because it's not a ranged attack. Okay! This is just going to suck. Ah! Well, that's nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. That's nicer. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, however, up above. The wind picks up and swirls around you. You're losing control of the broom. You take 20 points of piercing damage in the center of this cyclone of death.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cyclone of death!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and you are flung 40 feet in a random direction. That would be that way. So you are flung this far away, off the broom and prone, and you fall and hit the ground. I need you to go ahead and roll a dexterity saving throw. Actually no, because you didn't hit anything else. You don't need to do that. So this is going to be straight fall damage. It's an additional ten points of bludgeoning damage as you hit the ground, the wind almost knocked out of your chest, still clutching the broom in your left hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's also got a thing on it that hooks to me that Percy made.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it can't fly too far.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're still holding onto it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like a surfboard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Boogie board.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends its turn. That brings us to Percy. Beginning of your turn, you are still in the whirlwind currently, and its jagged form forces you to take 13 points of piercing damage, just being in the maelstrom itself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 13 points? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 points of piercing damage. Now it's your turn, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 89. Okay, I'm sorry. I'm doing math, which is apparently really difficult. It's been a day. Okay, out of desperation, having no possible idea of what else to do, I'm going to try and shoot at bits of it to see if I can dislodge anything? I don't know, trying to shatter some of the glass? And yell bloody murder?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take a standard shot to begin with.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to move, or are you going to stay where you are?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For the moment, I'm going to stay where I am. Well actually, I'm too close to get a decent shot, aren't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It will give you disadvantage on each attack, because you're doing ranged in melee.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I'm going to back off about ten feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which direction? Into the water?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep! I want to be about waist-deep, if I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you're still technically in melee. It has a large reach with its [no audio] if you move five more feet, you can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll move five more feet--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're now above [no audio]

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, as you pull out of its range, a giant pseudopod of swirling [no audio] (whoosh) runs towards you and gets an attack of opportunity on you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It rolled really bad. That is a 14.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My AC is 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You weave underneath, the wind causes the water around you to splash and scatter in both directions, but you avoid a giant blender of broken glass to the face. What are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) It's reminding me of something that happened this week. Okay, I'm going to take a-- blender of glass. It's a whole thing. I'm going to take a shot at it to see if it does anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need to have breakfast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What the fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We never talk anymore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In character or out of character?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Both?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you're up next.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 23 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 to hit hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, let's see what happens with--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When you shoot a whirlwind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm trying to shoot a whirlwind. I don't know if this is actually going to do anything. I'm not feeling very hopeful. Nine points of piercing damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, gotcha. You fire and you watch as some of its form takes impact and some of the glass breaks. It looks like it did sustain some sort of esoteric wound from the blast, though not as much as you would hope from your weapon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Huh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it did take damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I assume none of my Trick Shot stuff is going to use-- that thing's weird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It'll work. They take half damage for shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay! I'm going to take a couple shots, see what happens. I'm going to do a Sharpshooter shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's another 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the Sharpshooter minus five? Hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that was a much better roll. So that's 24 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. All righty. This one still is a larger impact than the last one, but it's still shooting in the middle of this swirling mass, so it's not impacting it as much as you'd hoped.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a third shot. And here we go. With the same Sharpshooter. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was a very good shot. And I'm now going to call over the earpiece: everyone back! Giant flying glass wind, oh god! And I'm going to take a deep breath-- that's actually what I said. I'm going to take a deep breath and I'm going to dive underwater. Put my gun away and dive underwater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Underneath the surface there. It is murky and dark. It's so close to the shoreline and with the black silt that washes in there, you have no visibility underneath.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That brings us to Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (squawks) I look over at Scanlan and I'm like (squawk)?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill the wind! Let's go!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So can I hold my movement until Scanlan moves? So I'll take us both over there is my intention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't hold your movement, unfortunately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can't hold my movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you spend your movement and you can hold your action to do something if you want to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Scanlan can probably turn you back once you get over there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to take off and I'm going to go towards them and as high as I can go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Giant eagle's speed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bye, Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bye!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah. You're a little over 100 feet away from them, so the 80 feet as your movement speed, with just your movement and holding your action if you wanted to, you can coast up as fast as you can, and at that apex of the end of your movement, what action are you holding? What's the trigger?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll actually go ahead and take my action and I'll stop flapping my wings. My intention is to plummet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Well then, you can use your action to then move again, like dash it and go right above it if you wanted to do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, right above it. That'll work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because don't you guys like, once you break out of your animal form, you change back?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you take damage and then whatever damage that you take that is carried over into your real form.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Into your 5,000 hit points.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll be fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So if you take 80 hit points, you'll take you know, the ten that your eagle form took and then you'll take the other 70.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You'll be fine. I like this plan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You'll be fine. You're Grog. You got it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Suicidal eagle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're went 100 feet up, Travis? Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's you with a Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Oh, I was on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless you didn't want to be on him. You want to stay behind?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, I guess I'm taking this ride too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want, you can still be 100 feet back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can fall off into the water if--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I would have gone with him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because I was thinking you were on his back still.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, there it is. So you're holding, so that's your turn. What are you doing, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I can't do much now because if I do anything, he'll break his eagle form.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which is okay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then I'll fall too!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hopefully you're close.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I'm 100 feet up. Straight up over this thing. Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 80 feet up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 80 feet up. Okay, I hang over the side and I will Lightning Bolt straight down into the eye of the tornado.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So with that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like lightning is good because it turns glass into--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 19 for its dexterity save. What's your DC with your cone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. So yeah, it fails. Go ahead and roll damage on the Lightning Bolt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would I get caught in that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's right at the cusp of the water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's also water. I honestly am just looking for an excuse to hit the glove. I'm happy to take the damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say that due to the proximity you might take a little bit because the conduit of the water around you. Because it's a lot of water, it's going to dissipate pretty evenly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28. All right. It blasts through the storm, slamming, causing glass dust to shoot up in this giant cloud around it and fall gently to the beach side. You go ahead and take, Percy, five points of lightning damage, just being nearby in the water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Awesome possum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It impacted, though not as strongly as you would have hoped. It seems almost like the lightning is somewhat in the sphere of the element of whatever this creature is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. So it did not take full--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It took damage, but it didn't take full damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's also the air druid you've been travelling with. Uses a lot of lightning. (coughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Does that end your turn, Scanlan? Are you going to move or do anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, I don't want to move.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He says he can't hear you over the comm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll inspire Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's the only one within earshot, so yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will sing in his ear: (singing) Fly like an eagle to the sea. Fly like an eagle-- don't drop me! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM, MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: (sing to the tune of "Fly Like An Eagle")

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and take your d10 inspiration die. All righty, ending Scanlan's turn. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far away did I get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just took off when this happened or heard that, so you'd be your full movement away from it, which is 60 feet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 60 feet, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, Haste has worn off. So you're 60 feet away. It would take you your full movement. You can swoop back and get right in the fray.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, then I would like to fly straight at the maelstrom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And stab the whirlwind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to do that, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to dive-bomb through and chest-burster out the other side of this whirlwind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hope so! I hope so, and is that Trinket right next to it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I will get sneak attack damage and I would like to use, oh good god, Divine Smite on the attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, what is that all about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Hold Divine Smite until you hit. You don't have to say you use it until you confirm hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right. All right. That's a 20. That's a 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was so close to a one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. It went one, 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that'll hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. So we start with a one and then we add these. Two, three, four, nine, 15, 20, 25, 28. Plus Divine Smite, since this is the first time I've ever done it, is 2d8. What did I just get up to? Shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 28. Thank you. Plus Divine Smite is 20, 30, 38.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 38 points of damage. As your wings out, bullet-bird form Vax, you swoop down and punch straight through the back of this maelstrom. You see its form briefly fluctuate and have a hard time holding itself together as you slam into the beach sand and glass right over next to Trinket, sending a cloud out in front of you that slowly comes down like a wave on the opposite side. You stand there for a second, look back over and Trinket licks you up on the side of your face, making a very cool moment maybe not as cool at the very end, but still pretty cool overall. Cool, do you want to do anything else?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I used movement to get there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You used your movement to get there, you used an attack to go through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to swipe again, because I've got the bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, this would be a throw, because right now, the angle you had to come through to punch through it, you would have landed about 15 feet from it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Love it. That is 24? Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. So you land and then (whoosh) throw another dagger back at that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So excited by the Divine Smite. There's that. And that is a little bitty two plus six is eight. And I forgot to add my bonus to the dagger before, so you can make that 14 for total damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Throwing behind with that secondary dagger, it plunges into the whirlwind and you see some sparks inside as it clashes with the different broken pieces of glass and eventually returns to your hand. I believe that ends your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm a real paladin!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, the two other elementals are going to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, there's two more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. This one's going to flank up behind Keyleth--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's up, brah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Glass as well, or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, these are actual air elementals.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Air elementals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against Keyleth, that is 21?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And 19.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That also hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Disadvantage against me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. That is 12?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the other is 12. Rolled two fours in a row.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, Charlie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The elemental comes up and swings its giant whirlwind-like fists towards you. You duck under one and then leap over the second one, landing back on your place in the beach. Keyleth, unfortunately, looking at the focus of this and trying to ascertain the nature of what these creatures are and how you could possibly control or bend it--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh hey, Gary, what's up? Aww man. God damn it, Gary. You were always a dick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 14? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And 13 points of bludgeoning damage. So 27 total.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 27 total.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that a hit point ring?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's badass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends their turn now. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're ground into the sand right now, dug a few inches into it from the impact of your shoulder and left a groove on the beach.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's glass sticking into your shoulder and you're like "Ugh!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh! I stand up for my movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half your movement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you still have 15 more feet you can move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hunter's Mark that motherfucker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Big one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, the big one! And then I'm going to shoot him! Twice! With Fenthras, which is the first time I've actually shot a real arrow for this one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, please hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It breaks in half. Super old, it doesn't work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the first hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A natural one is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A natural one just misses, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a d8, plus a d4 for lightning. That's a ten. Jesus. Wait. Ten plus ten is 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So much math with this thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. 23!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 points of damage with one arrow. That's really nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. That's a Vestige for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, don't forget that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Four of them is lightning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Four is lightning. So actually, that would be halved. So that would be 21 points of damage. Also. When you take the attack action-- no, you already used your bonus action to do the Hunter's Mark. Never mind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was going to say having Trinket next to it, but I realized you used your bonus action to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I'm establishing that and then Trinket can do his moves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Okay, cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use the rest of my movement to get back up on the broom? And go up in the air?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure! You go ahead and grab the broom and you manage to go ahead and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get 30 feet in the air this time maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say due to the nature of this, no, not quite. You get 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's see. This is the extent of your ascension right now. There you go. That ends your turn. Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. So not feeling great about this one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is, like, your shit, so let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Put up or shut up, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax is here with Trinket. Elemental, elemental and the giant glass maelstrom.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I have a 50-foot Wind Wall that I can shape whichever way I want?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So what I want to do is try and loop us all in and go around, Jesus, go around this way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, go around Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like a circle, almost?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Like a semi-circle starting with this guy going this way. 50 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So like a Wind Wall--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because it can go over top of guys. So starting 50 feet going around this way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Around a circle this way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The other way, but yeah. I mean it's 50 feet, it'll work. I guess it doesn't ultimately matter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What shape do you want with the Wind Wall?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A circle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A circle like this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to block the three guys out with my 50 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Out. I see.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to go over top of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And keep us nice and safe and comfy in a wind basket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Completely around you guys?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whatever 50 feet will cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's about the length right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because there's a little overlap, so can I start it with this guy and then go around to where that couple feet goes to this guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean it'll hit all three of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, okay! That's all I care about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So you reach down, concentrate, slam your hand onto the ground and as you do, the wind picks up out of the dust and the dirt and the glass and begins to cause another torrent of chaos around you, this one controlled by you, slamming into the other ones. They have to make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say: That's a big tornado. I can make a bigger one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your spell DC again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fail for the maelstrom. And fail, and fail. Fail for all them! So that's 3d8 bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh, and they should be gaseous forms, if I'm not mistaken, which means they can't move through it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. So right now they are all currently locked in the Wind Wall right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right they are! I'm done. I'm excited. That's my thing. That's all I do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, roll damage!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, sorry. Nature!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like you were built for this fight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it possible to go higher to get above the Wind Wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 15 feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 13 damage! Not great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 feet high. So how much is it total?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 13 total.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like you've weaponized a CVS auto-door basically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, cool. Finishes your turn, Keyleth. You staying where you are?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I now shift away from the guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll still get an attack of opportunity as soon as you break from combat, but you can still move away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it technically grappled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not grappled.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He can't move through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're fighting to keep themselves in place and together as the Wind Wall is tearing them apart.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll turn to them and be like: Let's do the mirror game, man! Do the mirror game, yeah? And that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is going to move away from it, shifting over to where Percy is currently underwater. As you're hiding down, this whirlpool begins to tear into it and all the water around you is jettisoned from all sides. You're no longer submerged as you're lifted up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would that actually--? Okay, fine. In theory, if there's a storm, you go underwater.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've seen Sharknado.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is an extremely forceful, angry magical elemental tornado of death and hatred, so yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you sure dragons are real?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am absolutely sure dragons are real; I've killed two of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, we've got cows!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does get its Whirlwind recharged, but it's not going to use it. It's going to slam attack you twice, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's saving its Whirlwind attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be 22.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The second slam attack is going to be 31.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh wow. Yeah, that somehow just barely hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first attack is going to be 28 points of piercing damage. Right on top, slamming you. Your face goes right into the muck with a sucking sound as you feel like someone's grinding a hundred blades into the back of your skull. Then it releases and comes down a second time for 22 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many hit points do you start with, Percy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (scoffs) So offensive. I'm still at 99!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am not doing well, but I am alive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You'll reach triple digits some day.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you'll be there!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, let me see what my constitution bonus is. Oh, it's nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is now your turn, Percival. At the beginning of the turn, as you're in its jagged form radius, you take-- double ones. Seven points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because he's in its what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He starts his turn within the center of its form.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got it. So stay out of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like one of those money grab booths, except instead of money, it's just lots and lots of pain.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pain and lack of hit points. I also assume it gets an attack of opportunity on me if I leave its radius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course it does. It can break away from the wall, it just can't pass through it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can't pass through it, correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, you left our huddle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's nice. Slightly better than before. Oh, bugger. I'm going to pull my sword and, technically speaking, I'm perfectly fine to just hack and slash on this thing right now, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep! You stand up, using half your movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Works for me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I stand up using half my movement and start slashing at it like nobody's business.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it, and it is a magical sword.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is a magical sword. Thank you for reminding me. I'm going to roll three at a time to make life a little easier. That's 21, 22, and 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All hit! Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You hit so easily.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do. You know why I hit easily? Because I do very little actual damage. It doesn't count as a dragon, does it? Oh, look at that!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're all the same.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He rolled six, six six.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 13. I rolled six, six, six. Roll of the beast. That's 39 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You killed the wind!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: From the inside!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Has anyone seen this terrible movie called "Rob Roy?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to start conducting it and spinning, slashing, and then dropping it to the bloody ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you guys watch as suddenly the maelstrom begins to come to this uneasy torrent holding its form together. You start seeing slashes and whirls of metal and flinging of blade-like action within the inside of its form before, all of a sudden, there's a burst of glass and dust that then rains to the ground as the water rushes into the space. You see there standing damp, cut, all these small wounds across his face, lines of blood dripping down the sides, Percy, with the blade jammed into the beach, one hand in the air as the water (splashing) up to his shoulders as he slowly stands up in place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sick!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to slowly start making my way, with great determination and not particularly much speed, I'm going to hobble my way toward the next one of those bastards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because on land it's considered rough terrain. Or, you can go full speed but you'll take damage for every five feet you move full speed. Glass, it sucks. All right, that ends Percy's turn, Grog you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, since he killed the big one can I fly down to the one that's right next to Vax with Scanlan on my booty?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes you can. (caws) Right next to him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Now, if hopefully I wanted him to lift the form, would I hold my action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! I want to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So holding your attacks until the form is lifted.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to land right next to him, like right behind him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a bird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Totally. That ends your turn, except for your held action. What are you doing, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me? I have to do something now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will do Bigby's Hand, and it's a concentration spell so Polymorph would drop for Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it does. Where is Bigby's Hand going?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right on the guy who's right in front of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before you continue that, as soon as Bigby's Hand appears, the eagle form vanishes and Grog, you come out with your axes in your hands, angry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Surprise, bitches!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not raging unfortunately, but you do get your attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Surprise, gents.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're angry, you're just not raging. So go ahead, and take your two attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Woohoo! I would like to make them reckless attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fine, but these are regular not rage attacks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I say, I'm going to have to kill you, dear boy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, the first one? Total? That hits actually. That just barely hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should I roll the other one right now? Oh no, it's just one attack, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, two attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural one. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. So two hits on that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, Grog, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make the wind your bitch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 16, plus bloodaxe, six, so 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 for the first hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm working it out. The second one, 14, then another six for 20. Necrotic on the last, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. All right, awesome. This is-- you're not adding your rage damage to this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whack. Whack. Scanlan, you have your Bigby's Hand up. What are you going to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it look like hitting it hurt it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, well then I'll punch it. I'll punch it in its wind face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right in its wind fucking face. All right, go ahead and roll an attack using your melee spell attack. Roll a d20 and add your spell attack bonus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that a futzed roll? I need a judgment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm calling it futzed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did I have a bonus action or did I use it to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't hold a bonus action. That was on your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nine plus 11. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 just-- no, 20 hits, totally. So yeah, roll 4d8 force damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You need some d8s or you cool?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nah, I'll just do this. 18.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill it. Kill it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So between Grog's attacks and the giant fist slamming into the side of the air elemental, you can see it gets slammed to the dust, causing this push and it begins to lift itself up, causing this almost jack-o-lantern angry face to appear in this whirlwind. But it's a having a hard time keeping its form together. It begins to glance about for some form of escape. Scanlan, do you want to move on your turn at all?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will inspire Vax with a selection from The Ultimate Dad Jokes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am so ready for this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I pick a random page?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hit me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A conductor once told me that a euphonium is Latin for you're a fraud.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? Oh, you phony.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's the name of the movie about the Cow von Trapp family? The Sound of Moo-sic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, take your inspiration die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Subtracted from me instead? He never gives me inspiration that often. What is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, fellow dad for that joke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did your inspiration die go up last level, or is it next one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it's been d10 for a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but I'm trying to remember. I think it's next level it goes up to a d12.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you haven't leveled up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We haven't leveled up yet. We're still hanging at 14.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's d10.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Next level it becomes a d12.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're level elitists for two more games.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Basically. Scanlan's turn's over. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a rules question, DM. Normally when I attack one character, one attack gets sneak attack, but can I sneak attack the one behind me and attack the other one that's by Keyleth? I've got friends around both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can attack them both, but you only can sneak attack once per round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's four of us around it, so advantage on this one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, let's go ahead and and look at that Wind Wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take a look at the Wind Wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It should only affect ranged attacks. It should only affect ranged attacks and gaseous creatures because I doubled checked that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Honestly, I'm quite often a gaseous creature.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are definitely. You are practically my textbook definition of a gaseous creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're fine. Just making sure. Forcing your hand through it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits. Are you sneak attacking this one or the other one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three, plus (yelps) four equals seven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs and imitates yelp)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Muppet Liam.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That sound!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (yells) That's Howard Dean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you stab through, the form dissipates upon impact.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was hoping that would happen, and then I'm going to dive and roll around Keyleth and stab the next one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you throw your dagger, it does catch the Wind Wall and gets flung out of the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I meant to run that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you want to run this way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I run through it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You can move up to there. That you can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And attack, and that was a 23 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 does hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which is a big seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of damage to it. All right. One is destroyed. You rush forward and stab the other one. It's hard to push through the Wind Wall to even get to its form. You do manage to find purchase. It takes some damage. That ends your turn. It is now its turn. It moves into both of your spaces now, we'll say up against the two of you there--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can it do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --and it's going to (whoosh) into a whirlwind. Yeah, it can. It's an air elemental.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It can move through the wind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Wind Wall? It can fly up and over. It has 90 speed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keep going. I'm going to cross-reference that. Keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because the Wind Wall itself, if I recall--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just checking. Nah, keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to check now before I do all these rolls.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See how tall it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is 15 feet high.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dueling dictionaries.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He hops the fence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does (hissing wind) and swirls around in a whirlwind between the two of you. I need both of you guys to make strength saving throws.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Strength? Damn it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who, me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Keyleth and Vax.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Strength?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have inspiration.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use Luck. Ugh, screw you, inspiration die! I mean, thank you for it, but still, screw you! I'm going to use my inspiration on top of that. Oh yay! 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys succeed, so you take half damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Damn it, Gil!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goddamn it, Gil!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mine's been rocking. I don't know what your problem is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course it has, Taliesin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're an anomaly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How much damage was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both take six points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Six, okay. I'm dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I fly over it so that I can shoot down onto it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then, as my bonus action, I'm going to have Trinket run up and attack it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa! Trinket attack something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You fly up enough where you have a view over the Wind Wall and take two shots, and as a bonus action, Trinket will rush up and bite it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Trinket's going to bite it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bite the wind!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 hits. Second attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 14 hit points for Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. So that was Trinket's attack? 14 points of damage from Trinket. Pushing forward and (growling) growling and biting through the middle of it, mouth full of glass. It's not fun, but it does some damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 17 for my hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then the next one hits. It's higher.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so two hits. Roll damage on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a lot of math.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. 20 points for the first one. Oh, plus sneak attack! 24 points. Two of those are lightning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (counting) 14, and then-- oh, I don't get that that time. 14 points for the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The speed in which it's swirling in its space is beginning to slow and images within its form are getting easier and easier to see. That brings us back to the top. Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How far away is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about 35 feet from you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, wind killer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God, I'm going to pull out the gun and start laying waste to it. I'm going to reload and take two shots with Sharpshooter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no, now that jinxes it. See, that's better. Look at that. That's lovely. 26 and 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Somewhere else in the universe, the balance is no more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's missed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me. I missed. I rolled a one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We wonder why there's the West Nile virus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks, Obama.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 46 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 46 total?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are all with Sharpshooter, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There were two shots with Sharpshooter, which is a base of 16 times two, so that's 32, plus I rolled a ten on that, which pushes it to 42 plus a four, so 46.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Even halved from the impact, you manage to blast the creature, its form hitting the Wind Wall and scattering against it. No longer physically able to hold its form there, the elemental dissipating into the sky in the end.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was for you. Now I feel guilty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all take a moment to catch your breath and look around, everyone roll a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural one! I'm cleaning my gun. I'm not even looking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. Two 20s, two ones so far.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 15. Right in the middle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys take a moment and glance around. It appears that whatever disturbed wind brought this sudden attack on has dissipated, and the creatures you've slaughtered have brought this calm stillness to the beach. All you can hear around you is the occasional (wave sound) of the water up on the shore. It does not appear that there is any immediate danger on the beach.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I suddenly remember the letters that I stole from the ship, and I say: Percival! And I pull them out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not giving them to you! I'm going to look at them with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are sketches and designs, one of which is of a more refined pepperbox.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, upon looking at them, I don't get it, and I hand them to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You glance through. There are other variations of Retort, the pistol that she had before. You also see a few very complete sketches of a Bad News rebuild. Not as good. Even looking at the design, you can see a few faults in it that prevent it from being as powerful as what you've created. Nevertheless, it is a fairly high-powered rifle-like weapon. Beneath them, you see notes of five constructed, and then it's erased, two on hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I'm putting this away and not thinking about this for a little while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like a ledger keeping tabs of each thing that she's created.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was for Bad News?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I believe that was for Bad-- no, it's the pepperbox, I believe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to take a little run towards the water and then shoot out and do what I was trying to do before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so (fluttering).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Scanlan, can you use your very, very delicate sword and put some very, very gentle difficult-to-see holes in both of these boats?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. I'm a master swordsman. I draw my blade. Talk to me, baby.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Talk to me, Goose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you say "baby," the voice has this, "baby," this low tuning fork vibration hits the blade. As you begin to go nuts on this ship, you guys watch as splinters of wood go flying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was not what I had in mind! Straight, delicate stabbing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, great. Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You put quite a number of pincushion-like blows to the exterior of the ship's bow. Neither of these will last much in the water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did we actually end up searching the boats for everything, or did we not end up searching the boats for everything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were about to when this happened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, those elementals that we fought-- were they left by Ripley? Was it a trap? Did we activate a trap? Is she close by? She can't have gotten far.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It looks like she dragged whatever she found further into the island. Can I call Trinket over and then look at the tracks and see if he smells anybody and see where they took everything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does anyone else want to take a short rest?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we have time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where's she going?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if she's teleporting out of here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 15 for me. Should I roll for Trinket, too, for his smell perception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Well this is investigation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. I was seeing if he could catch their scent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, then roll a perception check for Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he's got advantage on smell. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also see in some of the grooves where this heavy object was being dragged, you see one portion where it's dragged up, or seems to have been dragged up onto a shelf, like a very small six-inch shelf of glass. You can see a scrape and some splinters of wood. Whatever was being dragged appears to be wooden and part of it was very, very faintly damaged when it was dragged up onto the shelf. So you know you're looking for something made of wood. The wood slivers, as you look at them, they're a little swollen and damp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Waterlogged, for sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever these were, they were underwater for a period of time. Trinket goes, (sniffing, growling) and leans the head forward towards the jungle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You also have that dog. They can maybe team up and have extra-strong smell perception. Or we can save it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know why I'm saying this, but I trust Trinket.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want to keep the dog for later, don't you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, should I heal you, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would be lovely. I'm bleeding over everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well, I'll do one, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Heal his face. His face is cut up, I say over the earring.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is so kind of you to say.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll heal everything but his face. Let's see here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have a strong heal?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm terrible. It's tiny.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I'll do a 2nd-level, and I'll touch your face so I can heal all the little glass shardy things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, thank you. Ow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which is what, 2d4?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 2d4 plus six.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's nine. Nine is good. I'm a little better.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 17 for me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, wait! Before we charge off into the jungle, didn't you get a shit-ton of potions? Can you hand those out, please?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, totally.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I seeing anything out on the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ship is sunk. You do not see anybody currently swimming in the water. Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22? Looking about, you can see the bits of the reef that are slightly visible through the murky water surface here in the bay, but the ship is gone. You can see bits of floating broken wood from the impact of the ship. It's probably going to end up as driftwood on the beach itself. No sign of any survivors.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. I'll shoot back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see two figures out towards it that are floating in the water face-down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Check them for traps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go drag them back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're not going to be able to drag both of them with the wings.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But one, I can?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One you could, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will drag one back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you're going to drag my shame into shore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Basically, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your shame? You mean your pride. I drag one back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You grab one, and it's hard. You can barely get any lift, especially since he's so soaked with the water, it's an extra weight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I stay close to the surface of the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will ask you to go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, take a greater and a regular healing potion. Percy, take a greater and a regular.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just an 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're barely able to keep from being dragged into the water. It takes you a while to get there, because he doesn't ever actually leave the water, you're pulling him through it as you go. It takes you about 15 minutes to get him into shore if you do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to imagine that my wings bamf out soon after that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're getting pretty close to the end of your time with those.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to search him. He's dead, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Make an investigation check. You guys watch as Vax swings in with the wings, dragging a waterlogged seemingly unconscious or dead body, throws it onto the beach and begins rifling through the pockets.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, what'd you find?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22. You find 145 gold pieces.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, hello!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the first gold I've had in ages.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find a spyglass, and you find two small reddish-purple stones that are perfectly spherical in the pocket.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that all about? (whispering) They were playing marbles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That's all you find.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's that thingy? Pointing to the spyglass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a-- you know what that is. Percival, what is that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can look through and you can see that everything is very far away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It looks small now. Everything looks tiny.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just like you. Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, what are the two marbles?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That I've got in my pocket?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you pass the spyglass over? I think that would be great on the broom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's a good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to keep this spyglass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Isn't that for looking through?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have one of those on your big Bad News?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do. It's not quite as powerful as that, although that is an interesting idea. I might play with that later.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, can I fly up in the air and look through it? Down at the ground. See what I see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fly up, glance out. Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I get advantage because of the spyglass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The DC will change based on what you're looking for.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Those look valuable to you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They look like rocks!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are bits of live tree here and there, but most of it's dark and dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if I follow from where the path that I saw them dragging, and I follow through the trees? Can I see a path inward from there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see from this distance, there is occasionally a break in the jungle, or a path that could be taken that isn't completely overgrown and too thick to walk through, but that's all you can make out from this distance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do. I'm examining one of the red rocks. Does it look like anything? The red circle spheres.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks almost like a polished red quartz, imperfect. You can see texture cracks or layers of a natural forming quartz-like material on the inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it's like a stone? Is it pretty?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like a larger marble of stone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they magic?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we arcane them? Arcane check?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take a look at these for arcana.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an arcana check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Grog. Don't eat it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can have it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! 19, plus stuff. Plus seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These don't get used too often. They're usually used more in emergency nautical circumstances, or used as a means of gaining attention. It's called a flare stone, and essentially they're impacted hard, and then thrown high, and they turn into a flare.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that what we saw? Oh, so he wasn't a magic user.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, he was, because he was starting a spell.
