lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're flares. That's cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, pass that back. That's mine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should spread them out. Everyone should not have--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take the purple one, you take the red one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you take them both.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why do I take them both?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got the broom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'd need one, and someone else take the other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll keep the purple one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let the twins have them, because they're the ones who will get separated.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was the perfect interaction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a way to call for help, Grog. I don't think you're going to need it very often.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take off sullenly towards the trees.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to follow. He's got the right idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket catches up to you. Trinket's running alongside you, following the smell (sniffing). You guys watch? Is everyone--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do catch the occasional sour smell of a tropical flower. You do see bursts of ground brush and living plant life that has pushed through the glass and is slowly retaking the island over time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I keep an eye out for that flower?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and you see it a few times. It has a yellowish milky-white color to it, and it has a vibrant purple stamen that protrudes from it. It's almost a sour milk-type smell. It's not very pleasant.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grab a few, put them in my bag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You continue pushing through the petrified forests. You guys pick up, and Trinket picks up, as well, as you're pushing on for another 150 feet or so, you start noticing broken branches. You see little elements that you're used to in tracking movement from individuals. You can see what are sheer signs of heavy footfalls, occasionally another grinding along the ground. It looks like whatever was being dragged has now been seemingly picked up, or is now leaving less of an impact. It has more people now working towards moving it. That groove is subtly vanishing as it progresses, but you do see signs of people pushing through the jungle at a rapid pace.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are the twins quietly in the lead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, it's Grog and Trinket in the lead. If you guys want to change up marching order for this, let's do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Buddy, bud, you're very big and large and amazing. What do you want?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He wants one of those balls to put in his butt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I give him a small piece of glass from the ground and I put it in his hand, then I run up ahead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I grab his collar. I pull him back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give me a dexterity check, Matthew.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check, or an athletics check, Grog. You make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Acrobatics. Yeah, that's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You still have inspiration, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait! I'm going to use luck. No, didn't go up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You dart forward, grinning, as you just left him behind and all of a sudden, you feel your hood go (choking) and choke you from behind as Grog's holding it and pulls you back to him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is your rush?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (hoarsely) Fine, take the lead. I'm keeping the stone, dick.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (hoarsely) Right this way, stealthy motherfucker.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I start stomping extra loud as I walk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, please don't stomp.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really make it like little bits of salt and pepper beneath my feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glass is cracking and breaking beneath his footfalls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is not okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just had this weird thought. Do I smell anything? Do I taste anything in the air? Is there minerals? I had this horrifying notion. Are there signs that this island has even been vaguely inhabited at all, recently? How many people does it feel like are here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See if you're going where I'm going on this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I second that question.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 12 straight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to tell. From the beach, the only sign of any activity that hasn't been washed away by the elements was the campsite that you saw, and that was relatively fresh. You gather probably from the rather rapid rate of rainfall that storms through this area that a lot of any sign would be washed away over time. However, you guys flew over in the skyship, and as you cased the island, you did not see any pockets with villages. You didn't see areas of the jungle that have been harvested for resources.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to keep my senses aware as possible for the signs of a mining operation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And can I keep my senses aware for aboriginals of the island?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you guys are keeping tabs on anything around you that might be a sign?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm keeping my senses aware for if Ripley's invisible and is around us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am looking for literally nothing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And you find it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will guess in this point, one: everyone roll a stealth check, if you're stealthing forward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm looking for rabbits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glass rabbits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, 17.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, new dice. Three.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh. 30.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The half-elves, once again coming through with the skill checks. You guys, being quiet and being careful and methodical in pushing past brush without damaging anything, Vex keeping an eye on signs of movement, and the more you push forward, you start seeing some of the branches that are broken have less dust or general settling material on them. You're coming upon something relatively recent.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Question!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is the ground still covered in glass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are bits of dried brush, but there is still a very glass-based floor here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it broken glass or smooth glass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are sections that are broken. You can see the further in you get, the less that it appears to be a jagged, broken experience. But it does vary, depending.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But we can navigate through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can navigate through carefully as you move.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And does the vegetation seem to be getting thicker?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hushed voices, at least. What do you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a couple vials of poison. Can I dip a few arrows in the poison?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that make poison arrows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The arrows would be poison, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will come back, I promise. Do you want me to go look? I'll come back. I'll just go look, I promise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) You got this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Be as quiet as fucking possible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) I believe in you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering) They can't hear any of that stuff when you're that quiet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) I don't know what's going on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to stealth my way forward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (quietly) We can stage whisper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a new stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (quietly) There's no one really listening to us, so we can talk as loud as we want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (quietly) But there might be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the marching order, by the way, you guys are currently in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to be behind him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So Vax is going ahead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (imitating Grog) Don't make a sound!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax is going forward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm stealthing onto a battlemap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, you are staying behind him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going along with her? Are the two of you going forward, or are you letting him go ahead?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stay behind him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back with the group, or with him? He's moving ahead of everyone else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much farther ahead are you going?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My proposition was to leave you all and go look and come back. To look.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (quietly) Go for it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth for Trinket, by the way, too, because you forgot to do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a stealth for Trinket, because you've got to do that, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well I figure when I go too stealthy, I pop him in my necklace, but okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, then Trinket is popped into your necklace, if you wanted to go with that. Probably safest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, for stealthy times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So marching order is Vex. Who's behind Vex?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm in the back-back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Scanlan's holding up the rear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then I suppose it would be Grog, me, and Keyleth, maybe?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog behind Vex?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then Keyleth and Percy behind that and then Scanlan. Vax, as you stealth up ahead, you--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I use detect evil?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Detect evil? Is that a thing that exists?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, it is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You going to see anything other than me, really?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't flatter yourself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm like the city lights of Los Angeles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a wannabe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm such a wannabe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's going on? What are we doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're holding back. Divine Sense. The presence of strong evil registers on your senses like a noxious odor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spell? The level-one spell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, divine sense. Use this feature a number of times equal to one plus your charisma modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, the paladin ability.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's right. Three times I can do it in a day. Fancy me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. You stop and concentrate at the end of your turn. All right. You do not sense any celestials, fiends, or undead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. Okay. Good thing that I'm being quiet, so I'm going to still creep toward the whispers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see that groove reappear in the center of this break, and you see three figures on the other side of this, seemingly in a conversation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do they look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're too far away to hear anything, but you do see them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So goliath, Ripley, and the third. What does the third look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks humanoid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I go back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (quietly) She is there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (shushes)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) Shut the fuck up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (quietly) She is there. Grog, there's a big woman of your breed there, and a third. I don't know what. I don't know if it's a he or a she. I don't know who it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (quietly) What do we do? Charge in, guns blazing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispering) I say we put her down--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is fine. Let's all assume that everyone cannot hear us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (quietly) Do we know what the Vestige that she has does?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (quietly) We don't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (quietly) So what can we immobilize her with?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We do know, for whatever she has, blocked my scrying. So whatever it is blocked my magic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's probably immune to magic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From my vantage point that I had, how far away was I from them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were about 100 feet from them. You were on the outside of that slight open clearing, and they were in the center of it. It looked like there was momentum moving through, and they have stopped to have this argument, so you don't know how long until they're going to keep moving again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (quietly) How about we take a short rest?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can overtake her now if we go right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about the hamster ball?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we're not rested!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to have to take it right now!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can go in there on the hamster ball, but that doesn't do any--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She might not be catchable.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought she can't be magicked.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispering) She probably can't. Magic one of the others. I'm going to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can barely hear you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll shoot her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're creating a distraction? Why doesn't Scanlan create the distraction?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a very good distraction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we need you on sharpshooter duty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you going to be the distraction?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. She'll know I'm here when she feels a bullet hit her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we want to use these?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to make the treasure chest look like a trap triggered. I was going to have it explode with an illusionary poison.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, hang on. If we have the flares that she recognized with her crew, why not use the flare that her crew has? It won't alarm her to an outsider.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As a seasoned magic expert, you're going to have to be pretty fucking close to do that, friend.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think she doesn't care about her crew, remember? She's already this far inland--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think Scanlan fucking distract and we all charge in like motherfuckers!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Magic users, try and chase the others off. See if they'll back off. We've got to get that box away from them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have to make sure we lock her down so she doesn't run. Scanlan, can you do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll try.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a big woman in there. She's all yours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I pop Trinket out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I get up on the bow. I mean, on the broom. I sit on my bow, then I realize that I'm--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, Vax. From a one to a ten, would you say she's a...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight point eight?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sweet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percy, I need you to do something right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Make me a minor illusion of Ripley.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't move it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just a picture.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Minor Illusion is very limited as a cantrip.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just a picture.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just a little--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like a headshot?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A headshot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like a 1980s Halloween mask?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It lasts for a minute, and it stays in that place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's all I want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where do you want to create it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Create it right here. Good dog. I call the dog. I say, look at this face. Go grapple that face. Go! Go now!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to make my way to the tree line and get ready. I'm going to make my way to a tree line sitting down. I'm going to try and get a nice clear shot the minute that I see anything happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're releasing the dog?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm releasing the dog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to fly up to the top of a tree and try to be high up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You fly up into the tree there, you guys all making your way towards the edge of this clearing, the dog goes, "I'm terribly sorry. What were you requesting?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, that's right! He speaks!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hi."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This black mastiff quizzically turns his head to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I forgot you can talk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. What are we doing? Who are you? What was the presence here?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, hi. We're your new masters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Great."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you like kibble or meat, or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I ask a favor of you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are really in a pickle and we need you to go grab someone by the face and hold her down. Oh shit. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll see what I can do. When? Who?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the count of ten, maybe? This image, this picture. If you go over that little ridge line there, you're going to see three figures. One will be she. Go put your maw on her face and grab it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. All right."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're a good doggy! Yes, you are!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't call me that, please. It's demeaning."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have a name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You already have his name.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought it was good dog. Oh, that's not his real name? What is his name? Does it say it on the card?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reginald.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shazbot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It does? I thought it was good doggy. Onyx dog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, you know its name. It's fine. We won't go into too much--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mister Belvedere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way towards this clearing, preparing for the sequence. We're going to take a bathroom break and come back for the ensuing chaos. So we'll see you guys back here in a few minutes. Thank you, Loot Crate. Check out the stuff; we have awesome stuff with them. Back here in a few minutes, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nails and screws! [break]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back. Last we left off, Vax noticed that apparently Ripley and some of her crew are trying to make their way back further into the jungle and are in mid-discussion. This is just for spatial awareness at the moment, and depending on what happens, possible battle. Where do you guys want to be for this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's on the map right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the goliath right there holding the box. I didn't have a box, really, but there's a big box. That's Ripley, and that's the hooded figure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wanted to be hiding up in a tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Still can't see the third, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We still can't make out the third figure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The third figure is by Ripley. The goliath is off on her own with some sort of box.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say you're up here, Vex, off to the side at this open bit here. The rest of you guys, tell me where you want to be placed. Anywhere that's green is essentially tree overbrush.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where are they and the box right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's Ripley, that's the hooded figure, a hooded thug, and that's the goliath.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd like to not go direct, but slowly start creeping around through that green.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check. You're getting close.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to stay in the brush, but I want to get forward enough to get a clear shot so I can really take a nice, well-aimed shot at Ripley's head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That right there is going to be--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got some nice distance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a 14.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a Hold Person spell. I can try and hold her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, where do you want to go?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to creep forward and towards Grog, but being very stealthy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stealth check. Scanlan, you have a little dog with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we're going to start out under where Vex is flying, like if she bird pooped on us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 20 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "No, I mean no disrespect, but we must begin setting a trap here now if we hope to stop them."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that a he or she that I'm hearing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I fire. We all fire!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay. So who's firing right now? Okay. You, you, and you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm releasing a dog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're releasing a dog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to try and hold Ripley with a Hold Person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Going around here for this, you release the dog. The dog begins to run. I'll say it gets about there. Vax, you're throwing a dagger? Roll for an attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it a surprise at this point, or no? Is it blown?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Grog broke the surprise. You still get the advantage on the first strike, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. 24 on Ripley.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, 24 on Ripley. That hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 34 and the second dagger will go as well for seven. Plus poison. DC of 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are the rest of you guys doing? Are you going through?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did the poison take effect?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know. All right. Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to shoot a bramble shot at her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bramble shot from up here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. She has pretty intense cover from you from that side. That high up, you can see where she is, but she's pretty much almost full cover, so she has a big bonus to AC.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I'll try a regular shot. Since I can't see her, I don't want to waste my bramble shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First strike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hits a tree nearby.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Goddamn it. The other one misses, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's still shouting, "Stop! Let's talk!" Scanlan and Percy, what are you guys doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I say to Percy, should we hear her out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see her holding her shoulder from where the dagger impacted. The other hooded figure has pulled a blade out and is looking around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll shout at her: what do you want to say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You shout? All right. Grog, what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to ring the fucking dinner bell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We will.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can lock her down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I step on the branch that creaked like I'm angry at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It snaps loudly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Hex on her with my bonus. I'm going to hold my action. I'm going to train, and I'm going to shout from the woods: step away from the box and tell your men to put their weapons down, and we will listen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Keyleth, what are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to take a few steps forward, like two boxes forward, and I'm going to release a Hold Person on Ripley.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a Hold Person.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you're releasing it. You're doing it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 19. She's got to make a wisdom save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She begins backing away. The spell has no effect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking fuck it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She put it up and begins taking a step back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stop moving!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She stops moving. The other figure is standing there, looking what to do. The goliath is holding the crate now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Put the crate down or I'll shoot out your ankle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The goliath shouts out, "Here or bring it to you?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Put it down right where it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Drops it to the ground and begins to back away from the crate about there. Anna, who's standing there now, looking over and seeing you where the voice is coming from--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I see a twitch, I fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, now. We stand in a curious position. Shall "we talk?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can talk. You have however long I choose to give you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other humanoid male, you can see now it's a man behind there holding the blade out to the side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Explain to us why we shouldn't kill you now and let your two friends wander off into the sunset, not to be touched by us if they turn and run.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While he's talking, I want to fly on a closer tree so I can get a better shot at her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to have to get lower to get a better look here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I hide again and circle around further?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get about there to get a better view.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will also inch back and try to heel the dog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dog, which has moved forward--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Back! It's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Steps back there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll follow suit and also move slightly to the outside and around their flank. Yeah, there you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There, you mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you can make a bonus action to hide, essentially.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to hide behind one of the branches of the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Both of you guys, roll stealth. You essentially both hide as your roguish talents let you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vax, keep an eye out. Make sure that there are not people in the jungle coming this way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 25 on stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, gotcha. She says, "I have fairly procured a few artifacts for myself, and you have "done the same. Do we call it an honorable draw and go our own ways?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am in agreement that on that level, all debts are settled and fair. However, I believe we have some previous debts to still settle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have no interest in the petty tyranny of drakes and dragons. Every great beast that has "asserted dominance through history has fallen to the ingenuity of man. I worry not what you're after."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are so dull!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The other races, Percy, and you know this in your heart, they lack our dynamic ability to "adapt, to build upon failure so quickly that success becomes an inevitability. I have faith you "will all succeed in your mission, so long as you keep your precious white-haired boy in the lead."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You two really follow her? Are you idiots?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The man with the dagger out glares off at you in the distance. Make a perception check, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everybody, right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You coming here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whispers! Whispers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, things are falling!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The twins in. Come here, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! We both get it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you're taking the DM chair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Quiet! I can't hear anything Matt's saying.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're so cute over there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I knew it. I fucking knew it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything we should know before we continue?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anna continues, arm up, says, "Religion is archaic and unnecessary."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's she paying you? I bet I could double it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The man stands there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Attack her right now, and we'll discuss terms. I'm not actually sure I could double it, but I could definitely make it worth your while right now. It would be hilarious. She's awful!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Look, Percival."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do they know what you did to my family? Do they have any idea what you do to the people that you stay with?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're talking, she cuts through your voice to him and says, "Don't worry, Percy. Our "toys have already made the rounds. I sold a couple in Vasselheim and a few more in Ank'harel, "partially because I needed the money, but also because he told me it would drive you mad."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many have you sold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're looking at six and the instructions for creation to two other seemingly very curious "and up-and-coming tinkerers like yourself."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) Well, I guess I'll have to live with that. I open fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll. This combat has halted, and now it's progressing again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do a-- she really pissed me off. I'm so sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd like to throw at her again, as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you apologizing for?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am so nervous. Natural fucking 20.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your attack. Roll your attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 37.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dagger passes through her form. Your bullet has no effect. You watch as Ripley smiles and lowers her head. Both her and the figure that were standing vanish from sight. There's a streak of bright light from the distance as a small beam hits the center and detonates in a small fireball, which then causes the ground to suddenly rumble and (explosion) erupt in an explosion of white light and force. Everybody but Percival, for a moment, you are tossed with the blast of a hundred hammers across your body and face. Your vision is faded as you hear the sound of thunder but inches from your ear. Numbness takes over your form. I need all of you to roll a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does evasion factor into this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It may.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did the Hex actually take, then? Wouldn't I have noticed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You threw it over there. It seemed to cause a smoky apparition, but no effect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gil, this is on your fucking dice. Natural 20 on the second one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you say we have-- no, he has advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has advantage on dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have danger sense.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does the dog need to make a dex save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dog would, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do I do that for the dog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many hit points does the dog have?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Even if the dog made it, the onyx dog that reformed into a small object is now flung from a large fiery explosion. Dexterity save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everybody makes it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ground itself erupts, like something deep beneath the earth bursts outward. Grog, you take 32 points of fire damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow, fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, you manage to dodge out of the way behind a tree, the tree of which is blown past you, and you duck out of the way, but it takes the brunt of the damage. You take no damage with your evasion. The rest of you take 65 points of fire damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who took the full smack? Oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow. We walked right into that one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did the goliath--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) Trinket also takes the damage, by the way. Roll a reflex save.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket was on the ground, wasn't he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dexterity. 21 for Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog is not blasted prone. Managed to catch himself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. Trinket takes 32 points of fire damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good, because if he had taken the full thing, he would have been unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a few other figures on this side, as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And actually, you don't see that one. And Ripley steps out of the bushes from the side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where is she?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so they are there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The opposite side. This is a heavy groove in the ground. These are the only parts of the land that still stand at normal ground height. The rest of this is a giant slope that goes into a crevasse and rises back up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vegetation is gone here, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vegetation in that area is completely gone, and there is broken rock and glass everywhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How deep is the crevasse?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about 20 feet deep at its deepest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And everybody sees everybody, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, overweight. Don't fucking fail me now. That's all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, Gil. Natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. You like that dice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that Gil's dice again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's been doing fine for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's been hit or miss.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, same here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Although I will admit, I rolled gold for this roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "I rolled gold."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, I did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Going from this, here, because this is going to be a bit of a complicated battle to keep track of for initiative, I'm going to write it here. 25 to 20?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just rolled a natural 20 on my initiative. It is 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you get, Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex. Right. 15 to ten?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten to five?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: See you guys in a half hour.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Has she actually been hit by the Hex, by the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, I need you to roll a concentration check on it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine. What do I roll for concentration, again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you've got to roll a natural 20. That was a lot of damage, buddy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god! Shut the fuck up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A different dice, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jesus Christ, Taliesin. Somehow, in the blast, as your eyes flicker to and you immediately shoot up from the ground in a sitting position your eyes immediately focus on Ripley appearing from across the way, from across the crevasse, and that little lingering scar of Orthax in the back of your head maintains the anger of your Hex. You would have to designate it onto her next turn, but you still maintain the spell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My hate lives.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've got this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fate, hate, whichever. Six of one, half a dozen of the other.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man, that felt good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round is Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Where was I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are over here on your ass right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to stand up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's half your movement there. You're right at the edge of where the ground breaks and falls in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine. What's the distance? Is it only Bad News distance, or am I within 400?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're within 400, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I can actually put Bad News away and actually deal with this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, if you'd like to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They probably all have much higher-- they're going to have initiative up the wazoo, so I'm going to-- okay, no. I'm going to pull the big gun out again, give it a reload and give it a shot right at Ripley. I've got the Hex on her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you move the Hex over to her with your bonus action. She's now officially hexed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's pick a fun disadvantage. Let's see. Let's give her a dexterity disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dex disadvantage. Got it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. First thing I'm going to do is I'm going to do a standard shot at her with a leg shot. I'm going to try and knock her prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No Sharpshooter. That's 26 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit. She has to make a strength save, is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She has to make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 19.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Against a DC of 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She makes it. It doesn't knock her prone. It hits her in the foot. She almost falls over. Roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make sure I'm rolling all the right dice. That'll do. That's six plus ten. 22 points of damage plus three points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. (gunshot) The blast hits the leg. It almost knocks her onto the ground, but she catches herself against the tree right behind her and pushes herself into place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's funny. I'm going to burn an action surge and I'm going to shoot her two more times because it's funny. Where is she? What's behind her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a tree about ten feet behind her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hit her again with an attempt to knock her down; I'm going to burn another grit for that. That is 32 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 32 to hit? That'll hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not quite as good. 14 points of damage, plus three points of necrotic. Another strength check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another strength check. This one she does not make. As she readies herself, you fire a second time, and it hits her foot. You can see a spatter of blood off the side. She falls and slams down on the ground taking three points of piercing damage landing onto the broken glass and the rubble around her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just for fun-- no, then that's just her bonus action for that, although that would be pretty funny. I'm going to hit her one more time with a Sharpshooter shot. Do I get a bonus to hit her because she's on the ground, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, because she's on the ground it's at disadvantage. Any ranged attacks against prone people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Even with Sharpshooter? Even with standard Sharpshooter bonus of ignore three-quarter cover?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not so much cover, it's more the fact that they're a smaller target to hit because they're closer to the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So the full range Sharpshooter ignore three-quarter cover would not cancel that out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not cover that gives her the bonus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The whole theory being that it's easier to hit smaller targets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, it affects cover, it doesn't affect her being a smaller target in general to hit. It's the way the rule works.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's okay. She's down. What am I going to do? I'm not even going to pretend. I'll burn a point of grit to also ignore that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, there you go. It's a straight attack roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's probably not going to hit. Let's see. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 does not hit. It scoots past her and slams into the tree behind her. You see the splintering of petrified bark.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I throw my gun behind on my shoulder, and I'm going to head to my right to try to get some cover with that tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Around Keyleth?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, around Keyleth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jump over her prone form.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My dead body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look to the crater in the ground and I go: Whoa. And I would like to rage. Can I, in 50 feet, get to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Regular rage or frenzied rage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Regular. Can I get all the way to the guy who's right in front of me on the map along the side of the crater, or is that not enough for 50?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can just get there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll just get there. Lovely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see him loading a rifle, and all of a sudden you rush up to the side and he goes, "Oh shit!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to make a reckless attack against him with my two blows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 will definitely hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. 33.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 33 points of damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm sorry. 33 to hit for the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I see. They both hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 29, with five points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice, so 34, you actually did more! Second strike?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry, 29 includes the five points of necrotic damage. I'm so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all right. 29.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Second one. Total of 22, with another five points of necrotic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does that end your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I say: Thanks for the warm-up. And that's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as her right metallic hand detaches and hits the ground. You watch as a flare of purplish-black energy begins to swirl off her shoulders and where the arm was, now you see a giant shadow claw emerge. You see a shadow begin to encompass around her, another pair of shoulders and glowing yellow eyes over her form as she says, "I found a new friend recently. Seems he doesn't like being abandoned."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's the anti-Percy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's where we'll pick it up next week.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Brought to you by poor decisions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, she vanishes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Chickens are all coming home to roost.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I say how much I wish Pike was here right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, seconded.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I third that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we miss Pike!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This gunner here is going to aim at you, Vax, while this one is going to attempt to step away from Grog. Go ahead and make your attack of opportunity on him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is reckless. 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 20 points, including three points of necrotic. 20 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the rifle, it's 2d10.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I should mention, I suppose, that these rifles are probably very breakable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 42 points of piercing damage to you, Grog, from the crit. Because you are raging and it's not magical, that's halved, so you take 21 points of damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's eight percent of your hit point pool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we can all get together, I actually brought Heal today because Pike wasn't here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Going to reload the rifle and then go for another strike. With advantage, that's 17 plus ten, so 27.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, that'll hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next hit is 13 points of piercing damage, reduced to six. The other gunner, aiming at you, Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Disadvantage because of the cloak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, and it rolled a one and a 19. The first shot goes clear. It hits your form, but your form shimmers--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wouldn't a roll of a one with a rifle misfire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends their turn. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where am I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're over here, flat on your ass, looking up at the open space where a bunch of tree cover used to be that is now blown open, the sky is visible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I stand up. What are those circles next to Trinket? What are those?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are some trees that survived the explosion that are singed and burned. This is a trunk approximately this big underneath.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would I be able to hide behind that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using half your movement to get up, you would have 15 more feet, so this is as far as you could get. But you could use your bonus action to dash if you wanted to, because you're second-level rogue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'll do that and dash and hide behind the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You dash, but you can't roll a hide, as well, unless you want to use your action to do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I want to get behind the tree so it's still coverage. Right? Then can I shoot from there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah, so long as something's in range.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is anything in range?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on your longbow? It should be written down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know; it doesn't say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You should have written it down. Longbow is 150 feet and 600 feet. Yes. Pretty much everything except for maybe the farthest guy is questionably within your first range category. Yeah, you do have a shot at most everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The guy that Grog hit is outside of my range?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He might be; it's hard to tell at this distance. You'd have to gauge it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to shoot at the guy closest to me. I want to be able to peek out, shoot, and then duck back behind the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing. You didn't hear me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I don't know what you want! That is a 30-something. 32.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus, Fenthras.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck, man?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can take your second attack on her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was the female warrior?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was the female gunner, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not shooting at the other one, dude!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought that's what he said.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! I'm going to shoot her again. 18 doesn't hit her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 just barely hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fenthras! Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Didn't quite get into cover.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 22 on that one. Oh, and the last two had four points of lightning damage on both of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the echo of angry, gritted teeth from the pain of two arrow blows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I duck back behind the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're using the tree. You're at half cover at the tree. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The one in the far corner is not the one that you whispered about. Who shot at me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that I whispered to? Was an illusion. It vanished. You don't see that figure anymore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucking hell. All right. Oh shit. The one in the far corner is the one my sister attacked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, right there. You saw the two arrows.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I'm going to follow up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One more player off the board.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to move closer, or are you leaping up onto the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm Sharpshooter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This tree's too thick; you're going to have to get up onto the tree to do it. You leap up and get onto it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 29 for the first. The second is 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. Unfortunately, no sneak attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I know. That is eight for the first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're up next, Keyleth, by the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nine for the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great. The two daggers pierce, vanish in place, come back to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I use the rest of my movement to drop behind the tree and go into a crouch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You leap just beneath and if you want to use your bonus action-- no, you used your bonus action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, so I'm done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're done. That gives you three-quarters cover, though, from behind anywhere from that angle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could I have had Trinket run over to the tree where Percy is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. He's behind Percy now. All right, that comes to Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I stand up, very irritated, and I grab Percy, and I pull him to me, and I cast Heal on him, my 6th-level spell. I'm fucking burning it for you. So full 70 points because he's almost down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought it was a group spell. Is it not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not! I should have grabbed Mass Cure Wounds, but I was wrong. So I grab Percy and I say: Fucking finish this bitch. Finish this. I let him go, and that's my turn. Healing Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not at full, but I'm much better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking kill her, man!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're probably down next to me with some cover, though. Probably not up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to my last whatever movement I have to step back a little bit, because I'm really fucked up. If I can step back, whatever I can. I know I stood up, so I know I have half movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have three. You can get behind Trinket.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll get behind Trinket, and I'm not looking good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, after you see the guy back up and you start lurching forward, you faintly hear out of the corner of your ear a rustle, and your eye turns over just in time to see a hooded figure leap out with a blade in hand towards you from behind. That is going to be, with advantage against you, 26 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits. I have danger sense, advantage on dex saving throws, dodge, traps and spells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't help you in this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Traps and spells?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, which he got advantage on the saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 26 hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel something cold and painful sink into your back and your muscles tense up. You take--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm really tapped out. Not looking good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the sneak attack--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, sneak attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kill her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Halved to 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Halved to 14. Through your back from the blade. Surprised that the impact didn't take as well as it did, pulls the blade out. Looking at the blood curling on the edge of the blade, you glance over your shoulder at this thug-like figure. Young man, looking a little scared. That brings us to the goliath. Sees you. Dashes forward, takes no action, pulls out a shield and a big old thick broadsword. Comes up, yelling at you, getting your attention full-on gladiatoral warrior-on-warrior combat,. Shield at the ready, ready to tussle with you. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me? Jesus, I can't do shit. I get up. Those are holes, craters?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's a gradual crevasse that comes down and comes up to these points here with the ground that's been blown out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I get up to the edge. I can only run another 15 feet or something, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, roughly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit. Man, I can't do much. How far apart are the farthest of the far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of these guys are about 25, 30 feet from each other.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about that one and the next one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one and the next one there? They would be roughly 65, 70 feet apart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You take your action to cry?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. I'll fire a Fireball to those two in the corner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two dex saves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh man, we're in it, y'all, we're fucking in it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The DC is 15. The robed one succeeds, so takes half damage. The gunner rolled a natural one. Roll that 8d6 damage. Percy, you're almost up. We have one more turn before you after this, so be prepared.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's good. 35.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The figure that's already been stabbed and shot by arrows takes the full brunt of it and is looking charred, burnt, and barely holding on right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For my bonus action, can I take a potion. Is that bonus-able action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm letting it, yeah. You can take a potion as a bonus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll take a greater, which is how many?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 4d4 plus four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit, man, what a map! I'm so excited! Like a pair of crater breasts coming out of the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's my move. See you in a half hour.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll send him out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many more attackers don't we see?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They are the Hong Kong Cavaliers still at the ready.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like the Crazy 88; they just keep coming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uses a bonus action to Misty Step.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Onto there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good. That's funny.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's at eye level.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's on our level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stands there on the edge, lifts the staff up, the hand begins to glow in a shimmer of rainbows, and as the hand comes down like this, the rainbow blasts out in front of it with a sudden, nearly-blinding show of magical arcane force. Did I get my templates? Because I'm going to need a template there, Ryan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's how it works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't see them in there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, before you do this. Before you spend all this time. Is this one 60 feet away from me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is within 60 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am going to Counterspell that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are a beautiful person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're using your action to Counterspell? Go ahead and roll, adding six plus two, so plus eight to this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a d20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a d20, add eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck you. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12. I had an interesting thought, here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I like interesting thoughts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't need those.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, look, they made little caskets for all of our figures.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Peerless skill. You can add one of our own bardic inspirations to an ability check if you want to. It is technically an ability check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can inspire myself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's an ability you got at level 14.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can roll the d10 and add that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Looks like meat's back on the menu, boys!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Another four. Only up to 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16's not going to be enough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Terrible rolls!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What a visual!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got spice in my nose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wasn't quite as good as he was hoping.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And neither was I

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, it would get-- no. Trinket's barely misses.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tickle on his nose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm hiding behind Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need a dexterity saving throw from Percival and from Scanlan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, but good enough.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it too late to reroll that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you have the ability, Indomitable, as a fighter to do that. Scanlan, what'd you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 dexterity saving throw?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rolled a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, no better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, he gets 10d6 fire damage to you as one of the red rays strikes into you, Percy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Rainbows are a motherfucker!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would have been dead!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: People made fun of Thor walking across that rainbow bridge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stop making that face. It can't kill me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 points of fire damage to you, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 15? That's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Would have been 30. That is really shitty rolls on that one. Wait, Percy, you failed, so you take full damage, sorry. So it is 31 points of fire damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm still fine, thanks to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I rolled an eight, so that's two rays against you, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this Prismatic Spray?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit. That's a good spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's yellow against you, and orange. So that's 20d6 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thankfully, you made your save, so it's half each. Lightning and acid. However, the acid you have resistance to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that's halved again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did he say 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 10d6. The acid you would take would be 47, reduced to 23. So you take 23 acid damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're welcome for that armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 38 points of lightning damage reduced to-- for the acid damage, you took half of that, as well. How much did I say you took?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. That's reduced in half because of your resistance. That brings it to 11 points of acid damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just going down and down. I like this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then you take 16 points of lightning damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's much better than those other numbers that you were saying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Those were bad numbers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank god you had resistance and you made your save.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a cool spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The colors determine the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What happens, yeah. It's everything in a 60-foot cone. Was hoping he was a little closer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What level spell is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 7th.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like a Pink Floyd tribute concert.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was his big one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could he have Misty-Stepped closer to us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not with that crevasse, unfortunately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Some would call it a "cre-vase."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will fight you. Truly, I will fight you, I have two guys fighting you. Percival, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In theory, I'm able to sense my Hex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't right now, no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not sensing my Hex? Not at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's got a magical cloak of fuckery.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, she does.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's a bitch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going take three shots at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The first is a Sharpshooter shot. That's 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27 to hit, with the minus from Sharpshooter?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With the minus. I rolled really well. 24 to hit, I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 to hit? Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, it's 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make up your mind, man!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm really angry right now. I'm genuinely angry. I can't even roll. Should I count that or not? Should I reroll it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wasn't an intentional roll? Reroll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! Same thing!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What the hell?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bullet hits. You see the robed figure, the hood flies back. You see a man in his 40s with a chinstrap beard. He's still holding his staff, keeping himself there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am so calm, doing this. I'm going to shoot again, same thing. That's 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 does not hit. This time, you go to fire, and the mage, now aware of your presence and what you're firing at him, ducks out of the way, and it shoots past.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to burn a grit and I'm going to do a torso shot, because that'll be funny. No Sharpshooter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percival: fan of comedy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am. It is hilariously funny as possible. Oh, and there's no save for this, it's just if I hit. Come on, be cool. That's cool enough. 21.

lines.name: MATT
