lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Interestingly enough, the mage is unaffected because he's not affected by gravity. He's currently being held in a whirlwind. However, go ahead and at the full 100 feet high, everyone hits the very top of it, and then you can choose to then either maintain it or drop them immediately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're gunners, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a gunner there, and then there's the goliath warrior.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to hold them. I'm going to hold in place, and let's all go around, find Ripley.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can totally do the Point Break mid-air combat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At terminal velocity?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Isn't Point Break the one where they keep jumping out of airplanes? I can never remember.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, that is so high.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hell yeah, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool! Super cool, guys! Super cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are all currently now (screams) unable to attack, unable to really do anything well up from there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just think, if it had been Percy, he would have thrown up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Other than the mage and maybe Ripley, everyone's off-- no, and the fucker Kynan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he's over there, and there's the gunner over there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, that gunner should have been in the radius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 50-foot radius?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 50-foot radius. I cast it right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That would have put-- I'll make a dex save on them. That is a 21. What is your DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So just makes it. So it's barely holding on right now, reaches over and grabs part of the tree and is like (groaning).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does that mean he can't fire his gun for as long as the spell is up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seemingly, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I'm up in the air again. Of all the people who really shouldn't be in the air, I'm up in the air again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like Dragonball Z fighting now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, he's holding on to the branch, preventing himself from falling upward, grabbing a root and part of a tree, and is like (yelling) stuck there in the moment. Do you want to move?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I'm going to move. Jesus, what's the fastest way to get across this stupid crevasse? Through it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Through it or around. It's up to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get some ouchies in there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It'll take me like, a minute to get all the way around there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you ride on Bigby's Hand through it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you Dimension Door?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't do shit while I'm casting a spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That sucks, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to start walking around the circle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have any healing bonus actions?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do have a healing bonus action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm really low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five points of piercing damage to you, Scanlan, as you're running across. Grog's taken none because Grog's rage essentially halves the one point you take per walk, so you don't take any damage. Everyone else has been barely moving, so they've been doing the half move. You take one point of damage per square you move.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you're dying? Okay, so I'll turn to Vex and I'll heal her. I'll sing: (singing) I heal you. I heal you so bad. I heal you so bad, it's driving me mad, it's driving me mad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What level are you casting it as?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 2nd-level? Okay, so 2d4 plus six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 points healed to you, Vex. All right. The mage, who is currently held in the whirlwind-- let's see, here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: His options are pretty limited, if I recall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He diarrheas on himself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's just restrained. He can still do things while it's in the whirlwind. It can't move, attacks against it have advantage--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He can just go: oh, Toto!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh, Toto! Totoro.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That evolved real quickly. What did we just do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have no idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apologies for the delay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool! The dice sticks to the magnets on the boxes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, the metal ones?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Apropos of nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that works. So the mage, who's currently held aloft and floating about, looks over at the source of the whirlwind, puts a hand out and goes (grunt). You watch as an arc of lightning arcs over in the direction of Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It arcs past--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it going to be able to hit her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No fucking shit. He doesn't get thrown? What a dick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, he takes damage. Where is it? Basically, it just does the damage, and then it holds him in place. You can basically control where they are, which is the fun of it. It's restrained, and it's held within. Just making sure I'm not missing any of the elements here. First time in a turn that it enters the whirlwind or the whirlwind enters its space, including when the whirlwind first appears. So yeah, it doesn't keep taking damage. It is being held aloft right now, and you can move it over other guys as you continue to press through more damage. So anyway, the arc of lightning arcs over 150-feet distance, hitting towards you. I need you to make a dexterity saving throw, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have advantage because I'm behind Trinket or anything? Do I have cover?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it doesn't help you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have advantage because my armor is resistant against spells, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is true. So go ahead and dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take that 12. It's not great. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does not help, unfortunately. It's 10d8 lightning damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is no way that the guy who's currently got a knife stuck in her isn't going to get some of this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll find out in a second.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just asking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Honestly, I thought I was going to be able to last around to the next round.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's okay. There are options.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Keyleth, you take 59 points of lightning damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (incredulously) I take what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 59 points of lightning damage from the Chain Lightning spell that just hit you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, wow! What kills you in this game?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hitting zero's unconscious, and then going past your total HP kills you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have to go past my total HP?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Negative 115, or something like that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well I'm negative 58 now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no, you're zero now. Now it's just death saving throws.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just go to zero. I don't go negative.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you don't go higher past your total HP, you're still at zero.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But do I still have to count going negative?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You fall unconscious. The whirlwind vanishes (thump), and the mage falls prone--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Floats 100 feet in the air.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (thunk) Does he take falling damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cannot grab onto anything, because he was actually lifted up in the air, so the mage is now 100 feet in the air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Yes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yay, Scanlan! Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is a series of poor life choices.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it was!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, three bolts then leap from the target to as many as three other targets. So that's going to be--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, jesus christ.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Scanlan, Percy, and Trinket all get a bolt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (high-pitched) He's not going to get hit because he's touching her at the time that she gets hit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Kynan? Kynan doesn't get hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He chooses the targets. So I need Percy, Scanlan, and Trinket to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh thank god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I get to inspire myself on the save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not unless you already have inspiration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me see here. Make sure if it's an ability check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get ready to fall, there, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Oh, really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's about to happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's about to happen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Oh, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Remember those break-falls you practiced? Like in basketball in high school? Do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah. From six feet off the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Only for an ability check for you, unfortunately, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 8d6 coming your way, papa.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. We're going to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Trinket?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you took how much damage from that? 59?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 59 points of lightning damage to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (chokes)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan goes unconscious on the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Both of your healers are out, bee tee dubs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, you take 38 points of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be-- no, sorry. Half of 59. 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 points of lightning damage to you, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hold on, I've got to do some math. Oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you out, too? Come on, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm good. I'm good. Okay, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Trinket takes 59 points of lightning damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket is unconscious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But doesn't he go (whoosh) back to the pokeball?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She has to go over and pick him up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no. If he's unconscious, he goes straight into my pokeball if I'm within 100 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, (whoosh) so Trinket turns into a little burst of dark bear shadow and (whoosh) shoots into your necklace.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And everyone falls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And everyone falls. (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, no. Why?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, because Scanlan went unconscious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me and you, man. We're out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody wake up!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Wha-bam!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like, some Looney Tunes shit? (pew) And the head just stays there, and then (rushing wind).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone looks down for a second and processes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, Wile E.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 30 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On the fall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you take half.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Half?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you can still maintain your rage while up there, so you take 15.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Persistent rage, baby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a new feat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The gunner splats. Just a messy splat of red crimson on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good, that's good. Evening out the odds as we all go unconscious, they all go unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Impacts, is alive but hurt, and is like (pain grunt) on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does she fall into the 20-foot crevasse?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, and then takes an additional--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it. End her. Finish her off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on. Die, die, die. Die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, let's see if she manages to make a saving throw to stay there. She actually lands on the edge, because that's where she was standing before. Nope! Not with a five. So that's an additional 13 points of damage. Oh, she's looking rough. But that other gunner is gone. That guy's fine who's been holding on. The mage takes--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's already taken some hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The mage splats.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he does! Fuck you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I killed two people!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With your eyes closed!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you are prone on the ground there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many points did you take? That's it? Just 15 points? That's it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He is made of stone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hurt me. My hit points are actually in the double digits now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you poor thing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, wow. That's rare.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know. I'm a little frightened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Upper 90s.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mine are almost in the singles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's still like almost a hundred hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival, it's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Start healing everyone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. First thing I'm going to do is, I'm going to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Heal the world. Make it a better place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is such a bad experience on every conceivable level. First thing I'm going to do is I'm going to run up to that jerk with the knives and I am going to press my left hand with great authority, especially considering I've just taken another bolt of intense electricity, and I am going to Iron Man the living-- on the head. I'm going to just do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am going to use Diplomacy for the first--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have you ever used Diplomacy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the second time we have ever used Diplomacy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go ahead and roll for an attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I actually have no idea how to roll for an attack for this. I have no idea how it works, so I can roll and tell you what I roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, roll a d20. You add your proficiency bonus of five, plus your strength modifier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's embarrassing. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's okay. You'll roll a natural 20 anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what, for the, hmm--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just rolled.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He'll be okay, he'll be okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And unless you've got something to add to that, because that is a sad number that you just threw at me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's fine. You'll be fine. You'll be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say, unfortunately, because you're not a monk, it's going to be strength. It's for every physical impact.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, because it's touch. I don't actually have to put any--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a 22 is what I rolled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you even worried about?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How is that sad?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am horrified by what's going on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're touching him. How can you not hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But my strength is a one, so I'm horrified.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. But you do actually strike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Oh, god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he's going to go ahead and make a constitution saving throw. Natural one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Although I love when the dice make narrative work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kynan going to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead and roll. With a lightning charge earlier, any additional charge?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically, if it's one long rest, I may be at three charges. Two or three charges.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 3d6.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, that'll do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (quietly) Your girlfriend's on the ground unconscious, and you're worried about some little--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shush!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten points.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm there, you're there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten points. All righty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 80 feet apart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten points of damage to Kynan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your girlfriend's on the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not your turn!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Kynan is stunned for the round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you want to save her on your action, go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I also need you to roll another d20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just roll another d20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11? Okay. Diplomacy shorts out and is probably going to need to be repaired.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine. He's stunned?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's like (grunt). The electricity hit. He's currently shocked. He's going to be stunned-- he can't do anything for the next round.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Am I close enough-- in theory, I wanted to be touching distance to Keyleth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I use a bonus to feed her a potion, or is that a full action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To feed somebody a potion? That's a full action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (high voice) All right, next round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yourself is a bonus. But that requires you to pull it out, grab someone, open their mouth, pull off the cork, pour it down, and make sure they swallow it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, that's fine. For the rest of my action, I'm going to, after that, two slashes with the sword to finish it up, and then hop down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I have advantage because he's fucked at the moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, no. He is stunned, so attacks have advantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so let's do two little slashes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, it's incapacitated--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well they're both crits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because he's stunned?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because he's stunned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because they're melee.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, and so I'm going to roll crit damage. That's funny.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, are you whaling on this kid?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to whale on this fucking kid, because no, we do not have time for niceties. So that's 4d8.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Try and leave something that resembles baby food.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe. (counting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Double dice, then add bonus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. 34 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 34 on the first strike?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, that's 34 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Total? Okay. 34 points of damage. As you (swish) and start carving up the currently paralyzed man, the armor separating with each slash, the red crimson beginning to pour from the wounds, the eyes are quivering in fear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to then hop down next to her and on that side of her so that I can deal with that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ends Percy's turn. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I stand up, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. You still have 25 feet of movement if you want it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit. Who's down in the crevasse down there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the goliath.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's the other one in the crevasse?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is Vax'ildan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Can I slide down to the goliath?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (rock slide noise) Six points of damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you slide down to meet her, with that kind of force, you will take seven points of piercing damage reduced to three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You (sliding noise) down to the bottom.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make-- is she prone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She is prone, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I get advantage on that anyway, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make it great weapon master, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I pop in a bonus action? I meant to take a potion anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For himself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. What's a regular at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 32 points of damage on the first one with the great weapon master, five of which is necrotic. 32 on the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That goliath is dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (chuckles) Yeah. That's a 28-- uh, 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She (pained yell) gives out air and grabs the blade to try and pull it out from the wound. You put your boot down on her face and push her away, pull the axe up. How do you want to finish her off?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (noises of disgust)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (slash sound) It's purplish and gray. Given the force of the impact and the scattering of the top of the head against the stone and glass, yeah, she is no more. The body goes limp, and as you realize, your foot on her pushing her down, you're actually pushing the glass shards through her body that are underneath her, and you see them begin to pierce through her armor plating.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll give her a little extra (grunt) shove.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (slash) There you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have one extra attack, but I will--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, can you get-- oh no, that's too far away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nah. You know what, I'm good-- no, 25 feet. I probably can't climb out of there, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slid down there. I could give you an athletics check to try and climb out, but you will just barely get out. You won't get your full movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's try it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage, because you're raging.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm having a heart attack right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rage-climb to the edge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Rage-climb!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (snarling, growling, breathing heavily)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: End of your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Reverse Gravity fucked up everything a little.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not going to die to this bitch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That goliath went on quite the ride. Down the crevasse, up 100 feet, down, down again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She should write a book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She glances about and sees the state of her party and goes (groans) and then peers off in your direction. All right. She is going to go ahead and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's got a broken gun right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, she can take a bonus action to go ahead and attempt to repair it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can she repair on a bonus?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: DM says what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, no. For this, this would be--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's an action. It's a full action to repair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --an action to do it, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: An action to repair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ha! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a success. So she repairs it with her action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But she can't fire unless she has a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An action surge?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck! I shouldn't have even said my god damn-- god damn it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no, it's on the list. Don't worry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. This is meant to punish me for everything I've ever done. I'm well aware that this is punishment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first strike, she has two more grit points. She's going to spend one to do a violent shot on you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 25? 25.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 25?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, yeah. It wasn't a very high roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you still ducking behind the tree?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am still ducking behind the tree, but that still hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, boy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's too much math happening over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 points.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 points of piercing damage with two points psychic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 25 points of piercing damage? I'm going to have to try and catch that because it's going to fucking knock me out, so I'm going to attempt to snare that bullet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How often can you snare ranged stuff?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It snares all ranged.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but I'm trying to see how many times you can use that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can do it once a round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Every turn as a reaction?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's a reaction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just want to make sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (groan of frustration) I snare eight points of damage off of that, so that's-- how many points is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it was 25 plus two, 27, so 19.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're still alive. It was enough to keep you al-- oh my god, man!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he still alive?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) One point!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, jeez! Oh my god!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now you're doing the one-eyed blinky-wink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus two points of necrotic damage from Hex.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, no, no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (poink, power down sound)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not going to fall. Wait, uh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I spent a 6th-level spell to keep you alive, man!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you at?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Necklace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For this, you are unconscious. Let me see this real fast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll see if it has a perk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm happy either way. Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that does not affect you at this time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You taking a knee?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So are you unconscious?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am unconscious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (quietly) Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hit the ground. As you fall, the shadow around Ripley flares and you hear a voice go, "Yes!" She aims and takes another shot at you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit, that's hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits. You lose a death saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Third shot at you. Second death saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (muffled, laughing) Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She shouts over her shoulder, "Finish him!" And... she doesn't vanish. There's a shimmer, and she goes, "Ugh! Curses!" And runs (counting) 30 that way. Actually, not quite. Right there. She shouts over her shoulder, "Finish him!" This one over here, looking over to the side, goes and takes aim.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it his turn next?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. The gunners go next.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God damn it. Take it. Currently, I do have some AC because I have some cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, and technically it is--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know why I'm arguing with this, because I'm amused by this entire process at the moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasping and exclaiming)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you serious?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike, saving the day when she's not even here!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's not even here!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dude, that was

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When did she fucking give you that, man?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before she left! Before she left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She pulled it from under her bed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fucking what? You just died, motherfucker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And yeah, that's going to go ahead and end the gunner's turn. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kill, Grog. Kill, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm so far away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where was Scanlan on the initiative order? Is he before me, or would he go after me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan goes far after you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to run up to Scanlan, and I'm going to cast Cure fucking Wounds with my shit-ass healing at level four. So that's 4d8 plus four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (incredulously) 4d8 plus four?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a significant spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My grit doesn't restore from-- none of my stuff restores from death, does it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, stop asking for anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am desperate, because we are still so fucked!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 28 hit points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit, yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I do anything else after I've done that? I can't shoot any arrows after I've healed him, can I? Do I get one arrow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because it has to be-- as you get two attacks. It's either you attack or you do something else, so no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Then I'm going to, I guess, I'm going to run back behind the tree because I'm a loser.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be six points of piercing damage, running across the glass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jeez Louise. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. End of your turn? Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait. For my bonus action, I'm going to cast Hex, I mean, not Hex, Hunter's Mark on Ripley.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On Ripley? Let's do it. She is hunter marked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far can I get toward Keyleth and Kynan and Trinket on my movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make an athletics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Athletics, you said? Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't get out of the crevasse. You try climbing and the rock's breaking away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On my movement? What happens with my dash and my action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another attempt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll do it again. Fucking A. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get almost to the edge and the glass breaks. You slide back down into the crevasse.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Again. Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You climb up to the edge. (panting) That's your turn, but you're out of the crater.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to shout: Kynan, you have a heart! Think of Emon! What are you doing? It's not too late!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 17. No, sorry, 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. Okay. That ends Vax's turn. Keyleth? I need you to make a death saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have a success!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, it is now Kynan's turn. Kynan is stunned. The stun wears off at the end, but Kynan is left there breathing heavy, looking down at the two bleeding bodies before him. One that is, eyes flash open on the ground, and Keyleth currently face down in the dirt, with a little puddle of blood around the corner of her mouth. At the end of Kynan's turn, Scanlan, you are conscious, but you are prone on the ground right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ahh, what a crazy dream. Nope, it's real.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything would be helpful right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan! I'll tell you what I want, what I really really want!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, tell me what you want, what you really really want!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want-uh, I want-uh, I want-uh, I want to go fuck them up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I run over to Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's half your movement. You can move that far, and you take two points of piercing damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure. I'll Healing Word at level two to get her back to life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that's a bonus action. So that's 2d4 plus six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 2d4 plus six is ten. No, 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you come to consciousness.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I turn to fuck-nuts over there and I'll send a Fireball to kill the fucking gunner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what's the range of the fireball?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, that'll do. She, with a roll of a natural 17 plus, disadvantage on the dex. Oh no, because you were unconscious, the hex is gone. You probably would have lost concentration anyway, but it's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, and I'll do three charges, so it's 10d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, 10d6, all right. So yeah, she makes her save on that. The gunner does not. The gunner does not survive this no matter what you roll. The gunner is a crispy pile of ash thrown toward the back of-- go ahead and roll 10d6 damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 27. Not very good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can now see this crackle across the cloak. All right. That's your turn. As the lightning's crackling around her, she goes, "Well, sometimes "you have to rely on those that prove worthy." The shadow that's around her shoulders leaps off. You watch as Orthax now appears next to her. The shadow is still connecting them. You watch as this long stretch of shadow curls across and attaches to her leg. They're still bound by this tether of darkness but, nevertheless, they are both together on the field. Let's see. Orthax is going to go ahead and (whooshing) there, and is going to go ahead and look toward you and go, "You will be my "quarry now, big man." You are currently hit with the mark of vengeance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that a charm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope! You are just marked.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm marked. With vengeance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The form is in a bad place right now. He's there, out of desperation, but there is sunlight coming down from the sky and you can see it's hurting its presence but, once again, in a desperate place. All right, up to the top. Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh good, you're awake.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (yelling) Fuck!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I look at our little friend up there. I get up a bit. I look at him. Just run! I pull out my gun and I take the two shots, with the reload that I'm allotted, at Ripley.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, oh thank god it's the Retort pistol, because that would have been really poor. That's a 29 to hit, and 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 hits, 15 does not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, that's fine. That's 13 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the flash of smoke off her shoulder at the impact. You see her hair that's pulled up has now fallen in her face now, covering part of her in the front, where a little bit of blood curls at the corner of her mouth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I doubt he'll do well without her! I try and take cover. I'm going to pull as much cover as I possibly can and take a defensive stance. Oh, and I'm going to slug a healing potion for my bonus, thank you. I meant to do that, I was literally thinking that. That's the greater, which is 4d4 plus four. Yeah, go on, I'm fine. I've got so much coffee in me. Okay, I'm, yeah, that's so sad. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn? Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have one question. If I wanted to try and double my speed or whatever, get around Orthax to Ripley, would I still be able to hit her at all, or would I have to burn all my attacks to get to her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, no, it's an action to do two attacks, so you may-- let me double check really fast here. As part of your frenzy--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The frenzy's the bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, which means you get one attack. You would move, you would use your action to move again, and you would have your bonus action to do one hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I grab my earring and I say, Orthax or Ripley?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, fucking Orthax, really? That's a name I was hoping I wasn't going to hear again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ripley!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I burn that to get all the way--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll take an attack of opportunity if you do so. (counting) Yeah, you'd get up right into her face. Her eyes go wide as you approach. Orthax does get an attack of opportunity against you. He has advantage on attacks against a marked creature.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus I did Reckless, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you get to hit him back as you run by, as your reaction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 23 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It does hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You take (counting) 18 points-- no, I'm sorry. He had advantage on the roll. So that would be 24 points of psychic damage as the claw rakes through your body, missing your corporeal form. It shocks into your system, your brain spiking with pain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I get Retaliation? Is it a melee attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's your reaction to do it, so you could run past and (whack).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You run. You get raked. You spin with the axe and attempt to slam into it, using the momentum to keep charging forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 will hit. Roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Literally attacking the darkness. This is what DND is all about.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 27, with five points of necrotic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27? Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He might laugh off necrotic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I get all the way to Ripley?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, yeah. The Mark gives him advantage on attacks, but the sunlight is giving him disadvantage, so he just gets a single regular roll against you. Anyone else, he's going to have a harder time, but the Mark is helping him. You get right up to Ripley, gun still in hand, seeing you rush up angrily with your one angry, raging goliath freight train of an individual. What do you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing magic here, bitch. I will go reckless, Great Weapon Master at Ripley, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Reckless, Great Weapon Master.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know what it means, but it sounds good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It sounds great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28? That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why am I not always doing Great Weapon Master? What the fuck is the matter with me? 28, with a point of necrotic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little bit of blood spatters across the ground near her. She takes the wound and shrinks away a bit, clutching her chest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, the cloak not helping you with that one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First, she's going to use her bonus action to use her Second Wind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She gets to heal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She gets to fart twice, right in front of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is that beautiful fragrance you're wearing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She is not attacking you in melee. Seeing you in her face, she's like, "You're next." Leans over and is going to fire at you, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can she make a ranged attack while she's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. She's in melee.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like I'm learning things here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well no, actually, you used your reaction to hit Orthax, so she can move away from you without getting an attack of opportunity. She does take six points of damage from the run, but that gives her a better angle on you. She's going to use her--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's out of grit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she has one more grit point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's better than you, Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I think you're right. She did. She has one more attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're like the Olympian judging the newer Olympian.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've had to deal with this shit so much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That does not-- oh, do I still have some cover?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the cover, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With the cover, does not hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Natural 20, which gives her a grit point back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, it does.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow, of all the things to roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had that coming.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you did. You had that coming more than anybody.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just broke my glass by biting into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 points of piercing damage and four points of psychic damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Has she not lost her-- is the psychic damage attached?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The psychic damage is a thing you don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so that's down to nine points. Okay. So is it 17 total?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 17 points of piercing damage plus four points psychic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so that's nine plus four, so that's 13 points. I am still standing. I am Rasputin here. This is getting ugly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Third and final shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, she gets to shoot again! Misfire!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. That is a 26 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 11 points of piercing damage plus four psychic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, no, I'm out again. But she's out of shots.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike's necklace goes, meh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (zap) All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's out? She's gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She vanished. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I sense her with my Hunter's Mark?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you fucking kidding me?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But she ran her full movement, didn't she?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She did move her full movement, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But she's got fancy things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to try to shoot where she was.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 18 plus nine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 18 plus nine to hit?! Wow, does that hit. That's crazy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the other one is a 14 plus nine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 23 to hit. Of course that hits, as well! Just unconscious again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the first hit is 2d8-- no, 4d8 because he has advantage on you-- no, he doesn't have advantage!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You delivered ten points of damage while you were gone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm so cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You stealthed that hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 points of psychic damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm out again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're out?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking fuck, this is not good, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a slash attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. 21 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second strike hits you. Two death saving throws.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a crit within five feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a melee attack within five feet, and you're unconscious. It's two death saving throws.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep. Been there, done that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Percy. Big money, no whammies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Orthax's turn. Percy, it's your turn. Roll a death saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, is this it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Golden snitch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten. I don't remember!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe that is not a failure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it's ten or higher, right? Are you shitting me? You rolled a fucking ten?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was on the money.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, ten or higher you succeed! (screaming)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Guys, let me say I have the coolest character lined up, but okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I see Scanlan prepare for the bamf, and can I move to the other side of the last place I saw her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan is standing where she was last time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, can I move opposite of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe a little bit further. Yeah, and turn toward that space, and I'll hold my action until I see her. Bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so it is now her turn. She is going to appear right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stab, stab, stab!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just out of reach of both of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you fucking kidding me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a five-foot melee attack, and she's just out of range of both of you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm throwing my sword!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's bamfing, is that what she's doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When she bamfed out, the axe fell to the ground, and you pulled it back in. Do you make your throw attack?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! Reckless, great weapon master.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This will kill me, by the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog! Oh, Grog!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Grog! Come on!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That giant number again. That's 32 minus five. 28. We're good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everything you've got.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog, kill her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 32 points of damage. As she appears, you throw the axe, and it's a very short distance, so a big amount of your physical strength is put behind it. The axe embeds itself right in her upper abdomen, and she's like, (groaning). It's still in her right now, and she's, "No."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm throwing my sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to throw?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll with disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have advantage on my attack because I just inspired. Mythcarver.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mythcarver? Yeah, but you'll have disadvantage, so it's your regular attack with no proficiency bonus. You're not proficient at throwing weapons, so this is a serious penalty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you inspire yourself? Have you done that yet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, he can't really do it.

lines.name: MARISHA, LIAM
lines.text: Tilt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's not going to do it. You throw the blade, and it whips past her. As she appears, she takes one step, two steps there past Grog, sees Orthax whaling on the corpse of Percy. "And that's "another name off the list." And fires.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I do Cutting Words? Has a whole round gone by since my last reaction?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It has!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we can get to that. We'll see what she rolls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) I mean, I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Am I the first one to go?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shut up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're technically prone, so she has disadvantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm prone, and I'm in shadow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that is a 15-- no, 13. 13 plus 14. 27.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With Cutting Words?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to reduce her attack. 27?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d10 and reduce her attack by a d10.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll a d10!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have to roll a ten!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, no. Do I still have my cover bonus? It is a giant mess in there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does he have cover like he did before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he is prone, and that's given the disadvantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So you have to roll a ten. This is adorable.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why is this on me, guys?! Two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two. The bullet sinks into Percy. You hear the air escape from his lungs as Orthax suddenly flares up with darkness. You watch as the edges of the barrel, some sort of script that was carved on the side of one of the barrels flares away with a purple flash. And it seems like some of Ripley's wounds heal a little bit. She goes, "Now, it's time to make an escape." And she's going to use a bonus action to Misty Step that way, and vanish.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is my axe still in her chest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she runs away, the axe drags a bit behind her because of the chain. As soon as she vanishes, it falls to the ground. That brings us to Vex's turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you down? Are you unconscious?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not unconscious. Technically speaking, that's three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy is now devoid of life.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you do anything as a paladin? Can you do anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whose turn is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's my turn. Trinket's in the necklace. I don't know. I don't know what I can do... I think I'll--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill Orthax.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill Orthax. That's literally your best bet right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you do something about this? This is necessary at the moment. Do you have nothing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Even if I had something, I couldn't do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just scream. I scream, and I start shooting arrows at Orthax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll two attacks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you do something with that? Okay, never mind, then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ashley's asking to bamf in. Would she have felt anything because her necklace went off? That hits him for sure. 15 plus 18.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ashley's texting quite a lot right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not looking. I don't want to look.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 21 on the second hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. Roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 19. Four is lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And 17. One is lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You going to stay where you are up in the tree?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I want to fly over closer to Percy on the other side of the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You fly down this side?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That ends your turn. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I release Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket is currently unconscious in your necklace.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to attack Orthax. He's got people around him, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, did I get sneak attack on Orthax?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because he's in melee, so roll a sneak attack on that. 2d6 to that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight. Eight more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that's eight. All righty. Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use Sharpshooter on this attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a one, so that misses. I'm not going to use Sharpshooter on the next one. That is a 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. Roll for sneak attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (counting) 31.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31 damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's Trinket?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's in the necklace.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In the necklace? I'm going to stay put.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Ending Vax's turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh fuck. Oh Jesus. (groans) How close is Orthax to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Orthax is right in front of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seeing Percy fall, all I have left is Thunderwave, and I'm going to do it at 5th-level because that's all I have left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Thunderwave. Constitution saving throw. That's a nine, so that's a failure. At 5th-level? That's an additional 4d8, so that's 6d8 thunder damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled all sevens. So seven, 14, 21. Oh shit! What did I say? 21 plus another eight, which is 29, plus another eight, which is 37. Plus another six, which is 43 points of thunder damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you turn back out of frustration and blast forth this wave of thunderous energy, you watch as Orthax scatters for a second and falls into this small pile of shadow on the ground that is now shifting for some sort of focus, (hissing) around the ground like a slippery snake. Orthax is essentially at zero hit points. That ends Keyleth's turn. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I walk over and pick up my sword slowly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You take five points of piercing damage to go over and get it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Even gingerly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gingerly, you can't quite get to your sword.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And hold my attack in case maybe she bamfs back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can hold a spell, too, if you want.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm holding a spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What spell are you holding?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think she's resistant to it, but I will hold Otiluke's Resilient Sphere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, that ends your turn. Back up at the top. Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go and get my axe, because I'm still raging!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You pick up the axe right there where it was on the ground after she vanished.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I hold my action in case she comes back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. End of your turn, she appears.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She does?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will encapsulate her, or attempt to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Otiluke's Resilient Sphere. All right, dexterity saving throw against a DC of?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 21, with disadvantage, because I Cutting Words-ed her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. That would be a 16. The sphere encapsulates her. She is now currently bound within the sphere and she looks about suddenly, going, "What? What the heck is going on?!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can curse. It's okay; you killed one of us. Okay. Everyone gather around her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not leaving Percy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to drop this thing, and we're all going to fucking kill her together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, we are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She stands there and fires at the wall, and it has no effect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have three attacks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I slowly walk up to her with the sword in my hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm walking over, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Well, first, at the end of her turn, the last round of the Blink spell does not go off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The roll didn't happen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she didn't blink out, so she's now locked in the sphere and she's starting to look about extremely nervously. The shadow of Orthax comes and finds her and is beneath the orb and can't quite get through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No magic can happen in the orb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all bring yourself towards the edge?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm staying. I'm staying next to Percy. I'll shoot her from a distance!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the sake of brevity, we'll say it comes back to Scanlan's turn, and everyone's holding their action?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to get right up next to the orb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do, as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm getting up on the log so I can get a clean shot at her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vax, you with us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kynan actually walks along with you and heads up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ready?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm ready.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When you are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see her face flash in a couple of ways, and she looks cunningly at all of you and smiles.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percy's killing you right now, not us. I drop it, and we all attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stab.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Obliviate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and roll, Grog. Roll your three attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless, great, everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, roll your two attacks. Vax, roll your attacks. Scanlan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not bad, Gil. (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we doing melee attacks, or spell attacks, or what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spell attacks is fine. She doesn't have a whole lot of energy left in her engine, and we don't even need to roll damage, because: How do you, Vox Machina, want to do this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to sink my dagger into her arm, sever all around her shoulder, and rip her fake arm off of her body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunts) The arm plummets to the ground, the shadow still coalescing where the wound is. The shadow of Orthax shoots up into where the exposed wound is. With that moment, who does what next?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'd like to carve the de Rolo crest into her forehead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she's clutching this, you reach forward and grab her by the throat, her eyes wide, and slash across. Right now, she has no strength to resist.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to take the axe and go straight across her navel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to take a Grasping Vine and choke her around her throat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want an arrow straight through her heart, and one in her mouth as she screams.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all turn and look back over your shoulder and see the still body of Percy against the tree trunks over there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (tearfully) I'm still going to try and cast Cure Wounds on him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (tearfully) I do the same.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we'll pick up next episode.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. Shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Why would you do that to us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's what they would have done.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm okay with this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have nothing left.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What just happened?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, is that it? We need to know, because if that's it, then we've got to go get drinks. (laughs) That was our promise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are certain people that have magical, divine abilities that have been known to restore life. It's happened before to other members of your party.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we get there, though? We're so far away. You could bamf us through a tree? There's no trees.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not today!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's depleted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm totally depleted until we sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe I could put him in the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In the bag of colding?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, not in the bag of colding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think Percy would like that. I think that's very appropriate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could put him in the necklace and maybe stabilize him? I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can't stabilize him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going to make us deal with this for a fucking week?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As the person who is sitting here, I think that we will see you next week. It is time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've grown a lot of emotional attachment to this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We can keep going for a bit--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I need to process.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pick this up later.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ashley just texted. She doesn't work next Thursday.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She doesn't work. She is desperately wanting to get in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike would be an individual to talk to about this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, that went sideways.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Let's stop this conversation for now. We'll have more of this conversation later. I will not have this conversation online, either, guys. Sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nothing left under a 3rd-level spell. I have nothing left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Next week, with new Vox Machina member Wil Wheaton. Thank you for your service, Taliesin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shut up, Sam!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wheaton will be joining us every week.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll have this talk later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The story will continue next week. Have hope. Have faith. We'll see what transpires.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? We don't have faith at this table!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Some of us do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's okay, honey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fun to be the DM.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have a good night guys. Is it Thursday yet? [music]
